text: Very professional and efficient at handling patient during these times.

name: Donald Eade
text: Great job and health screening and the professional care!

name: Cindy Failing
text: Staff is great

name: Mark Havira
text: Great experience

name: Cassidy Orand
text: I love this place! My teeth feel so clean after I leave and I love the warm and friendly staff.

name: Sharon Hauser
text: I visited Hall Cosmetic and Family Dentistry earlier this week for my six month check-up. As usual I was treated by a professional staff who was kind and thoughtful. The expertise of Vanessa, my hygienist was exceptional. She was very thorough. Finally, I love Dr. Hall. He does great work. I have been his patient for quite a few years, and give him nothing but high praise. I feel at home here.

name: Jeff king
text: Dr Hall is a very caring doctor and does not recommend any thing that I do not need. The staff is absolutely wonderful.

name: Steve Davies
text: I am so glad my wife found Dr. Hall and got us both in for some awesome dental work. In my 60 years I have been to my share of dentist.  But I have never been to one where I had zero pain while in the chair. Dr. Hall did 2 crowns and a filling on me all at the same time and I never felt any pain. It's well worth the 40 mile drive to see a great dentist. 👍

name: Bev Hunter
text:
I recently visited Hall Dentistry for my three-month cleaning appointment. Debbie, my longtime Super Dental Hygienist uses her great skills and the latest equipment to give me the brightest and  cleanest feel you could want.

This office is filled with the friendliest staff and highly qualified personnel to make your visit great every time.  I have been a patient at this practice for more than ten years and I am always pleased with the quality of care I receive.

Dr. Hall is a wonderful dentist and does amazing work.  He always wants to ensure that I am comfortable and have no pain.

I highly recommend Dr. Hall and his staff to you!

name: Mallory Carrington
text: I have a lot of anxiety about going to the dentist,  but Dr. Hall and his staff made me feel very comfortable and eased my anxiety the minute I walked in. The staff was very patient with me and my cleaning went perfect.  I would highly recommend Dr Hall and his team for anyone who is in the same boat as me. They did offer me some medicine (while there) to ease my fears, but I ended up being ok without it. It was nice to know that it is an option.

name: Gretchen Youngdahl
text:
Dr Hall and the staff are both professional and compassionate.  There are several dentists in the area, but this staff works as a unit and are on the same wave length. Not only would I recommend Dr. Hall, I already have to my best friend.  He was concerned about making sure I fully understood all of my options and let me make the choice of what I am comfortable with.
Highly recommend them. I’m glad I found a good dentist.

name: Gabrielle Carrier
text: I was so apprehensive about some much needed cosmetic work on my front teeth and by chance a friend recommended Dr. Hall and staff! Upon initial consult Dr. Hall made me feel very at ease and comfortable and listened to what I wanted, a NATURAL smile! He did not talk me into any extra add ons and braces like other dentist. He did only what I wanted/needed to be done and made it work. I ended up with a wonderful two new front teeth and could not be more pleased with the outcome! The staff are so kind and very attentive to your needs! I can’t wait to show off my new smile!!! I highly recommend him!

name: Logan Echave
text: I’m new to the area and could not be more satisfied with my experience. They were professional, gentle with my teeth, and happy to walk me through everything. As someone who isn’t a huge fan of going to the dentist, I’d recommend Hall to anyone.

name: Tyler Scott
text: Dr Hall and all of his staff are always amazing. I highly recommend Dr Hall if you are looking for a new dentist in the Birmingham area.

name: Tommy Maddox
text: Because of a sensitive gag reflex, I had not been to the dentist in 2-1/2 years.  I suffered a broken tooth and contacted Hall Dentistry at the suggestion of my wife, who uses them.  They were great in using sedation dentistry (oral and nitrous oxide) to replace a crown and insert a new crown.  I am now able to go to the dentist regularly again.  Kudos to Dr. Hall and his entire staff!

name: Paul Ferrill
text: Dr. Hall's office is professional and efficient. I was able to get in to see him with a tooth issue in just a few days. I especially like their new portable X-Ray machine. My issue required a small amount of bite adjustment and now I'm good to go!

name: Todd Osborne
text: Love my hygienist (Donna) and Dr. Hall. I’ve been treated well every visit and they make it enjoyable. Sometimes they make it fun. The ability to crate a custom cap while you wait is a huge convenience. I’m not too crazy about the automated text system to confirm your appointment. It’s persistent if nothing else. I’m willing, however, to overlook the nuisance factor for the other good things. :-) Let me know when I can pick up my Yeti cooler.

name: Ashley Serio
text: I was a first-time patient today and could not have been more pleased with my experience.  I don’t have “dental anxiety” by any means, but was nervous simply because I’m overall a very picky person!  From the front office staff, to my wonderful hygienist Vanessa, to Dr. Hall, my expectations were greatly exceeded!  Dr. Hall and his staff were all OUTSTANDING and I look forward to being an established patient at this dental practice!

name: Joy Cannon
text:
Very upbeat, friendly, knowledgeable, and competent staff!  They work together like a well-oiled machine, all the while making each patient feel welcome and important.

This was my first visit to Hall Cosmetic & Family Dentistry.  From taking and showing me all the xrays/pictures to customizing the most thorough cleaning procedure for my needs, Deb is the best hygienist I have ever had.  Dr. Hall is a very personable, calm, and amazing dentist.  Great "chairside" manner!  He explained the problem areas and shared his plan to fix them in a concise and easy-to-understand manner.  I couldn't be happier!

name: Jeremiah Langston
text: Very comfortable and professional! Everyone there is very polite and kind. Great work too! They always call to remind me of my appointments and they also call the day after to check on me. They go above and beyond what you expect! Couldn’t be happier, I highly recommend this office!

name: Karen Upchurch
text: What a great dentist!  Dr. Hall is very patient, gentle and friendly. I had to have some major work done over several visits and he worked with my schedule. His entire staff is friendly and qualified.  I highly recommend this dental practice. Five stars across the board.

name: Kisha Davis
text: Oh my, I honestly don't know where to start! All the staff was AMAZING! They're very welcoming and helpful. Dr. Hall was very informative in explaining  my oral hygiene situation. I have always had high anxiety about going to the dentist and I was literally shaking when I was there. By the time I left, I was relaxed, happy, and pain free. It may sound corny but this dentist office is EVERYTHING you could possibly ask for in any establishment. From excellent customer service to awesome oral hygiene care!

resp.text: We are so thrilled to have helped! Thank you so much for taking the time for this review. It means more than you know.

name: andre smith
text: Dr Hall is fantastic! He is passionate about his work and his patients. His staff goes the extra mile and then some. I was crunched for time on my recent 1st visit and his staff was very accommodating. They all went out of their way to ensure that I got the best treatment in the allotted time. I have since done veneers with Dr Hall. He once again delivered on time. And his work is absolutely amazing. His pricing is more than fair for the quality he delivers. Thank you Dr Hall and Staff. You all Rock!

name: Mary Hayes
text: Doctor Hall and his staff are awesome. I have had multiple visits and each visit they have given exceptional service. The office plays music which is calming and relaxing.

name: Eva Pickens
text: After experiencing an unexpected tooth issue, I looked for a dentist that could help me diagnose my problem. I called and they scheduled me the same day. Dr. Hall examined my tooth problem and made recommendation. He did not do anything but help resolve the problem. No unnecessary tooth repair. I made an appt to have my teeth cleaned.  The staff were very personable and professional. It was a great experience and I highly recommend Dr. Hall and his staff.

name: Mary Vensel
text: As always, Dr. Hall and his staff were courteous, proficient and on time. I am happy to trust them with my dental work.

name: Candous Langston
text: Super impressed! I've never been to a more thorough dentist. Staff are so sweet and professional and everything flowed smoothly! Extremely friendly administrative staff in the front, delightful dental hygienist, and a dentist who seems to have a good personality for dealing with people of all ages. Dr. Hall took time to go over my concerns and created a plan of action to give me a confident smile... Thankful for finding them!! If you want to be treated well and have top notch care, this is the place! (P.S. Donna is awesome!)

name: Hannah Hendricks
text: First,  I am terrified of the dentist.  Both Dr Hall and Debbie worked hard and patiently to put me at ease.  I am missing several teeth and they helped me with a workable plan. This plan not only helps with my phobias but works with my pocketbook without requiring many months to accomplish good oral health results.  If you are like me;  scared and in need of an excellent,  caring dentist and staff!!,  give Dr Hall a chance to solve your oral health concerns/needs.

name: Sheri Nichols
text: The staff was very friendly & took extra time to explain and answer all of my questions. Also communication through email was quick & easy!

name: L C
text: Everyone at Hall Cosmetic and Family Dentistry welcomed me as if I was family. They are very pleasant and calming. I was a first time patient and they did a thorough exam, explaining as they went along. I feel like I have found exactly the place I need to be for all my dental needs.

name: Ariel Croom
text: I get very nervous when going to the dentist, but I have had 4 crowns done with Dr. Hall and he is very aware of my fear and makes me feel very comfortable! Everyone is professional and kind, and it’s very clean. I highly recommend!

name: Melanie Anderson
text: Dr. Hall and his staff are always so friendly and professional. When arriving for my appointment  I am always called back promptly. They go above and beyond to accommodate their patients.

name: Marjorie Crawford
text: We appreciate Dr. Hall and his staff very much. We have received excellent service and would highly recommend them if you are looking for dental care.👍🏻👍🏻

name: David Pruitt
text:
Always a friendly and professional atmosphere when your being seen.
The technicians explain every detail of their work and Dr Hall is ready to discuss all the details of his examination.
Cannot imagine any place better for my dental care.

name: Jo Jo Broski
text: I had the best experience I've ever had in any type of medical office ever. I got the answers I wanted precisely down to the exact amount of what I wanted to know. Dr Hall, Mrs. Leslie & all of the rest of the team, were all extremely kind to me. They all answered every single question I had and I left the office feeling like I was a family member and can't wait to go back.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We are excited to see you again.

name: Tyler Davis
text: This place is fantastic. Everyone is super nice & they are very understanding and encouraging when it comes to dealing with dental related anxiety. Highly recommend!

name: Kristy Gray
text: Dr. Hall and his entire staff are amazing!  They are kind and caring as well as being consummate professionals!  I highly recommend Dr. Hall!

name: Tami Wood
text:
I have been in the Birmingham area for 12 years. Visiting dentist after dentist. I am extremely picky with Dentist and Doctors. Even more so important I have been struggling with Extreme teeth grinding for a year! So bad it has interfered with my daily living!
I went to multiple dentist and specialist to try and find some answers and relief ! Needless to say one injected Botox did nothing another said it was all in my mind!  Another wanted to completely redo the 25K dollars worth of crown work I have done over the last few years. I have seen Dr Hall now 3 times and what I like most is he LISTENS! Nothing is worse than feeling rushed at an appointment! We as patients pay for services and deserve the time and respect. This is exactly what Dr Hall gives you. He was the first dentist to actually not only listen to me but to help me find a resolution! Although I have a few more appointments to get my issues under control I am completely satisfied with Dr Hall and his staff! I have moved my entire family from our existing dentist to Dr Hall. I hope to be his patient for years to come! Highly recommended!

resp.text: Tami thank you so much for taking the time for this wonderful review!

name: Kathy Olive
text:
Dr Hall is the best! And so is his staff. Thanks Debbie for taking good care of me. ❤️
Ps. Discovering the coffee station in the waiting room means I can bypass Starbucks next time!

name: Ellen Bryant
text: I’ve never been a huge fan of going to the dentist, but I’ve never had anything other than a positive experience at Hall Cosmetic and Family Dentistry. The moment you walk through the door you are greeted with a smile. Dr. Hall and his staff make you feel at ease whether you’re just in for a cleaning or a more involved procedure. They are very patient and willing to answer any questions you may have and/or explain any procedure you’re having done. Debbie Carter is a fantastic hygienist. She takes the time to get to know her patients, and she has always done an excellent job cleaning my teeth without causing me any discomfort. I cannot recommend this practice enough. If you are new to town or just looking for a new dentist you should definitely go see Dr. Hall.

name: Sharon Lee
text:
Dr. Hall has been my dentist since he took over Dr. Chuck Ellis's practice.  He and the staff are very professional yet they make your visit feel like you are part of a family. Since I drive from South Alabama to come to Dr. Hall, I would definitely recommend him and his wonderful staff.
Sharon Lee

resp.text: Thank you Sharon! Always a pleasure to see your name on our schedule and to catch up when you are in town.

name: Courtney
text: This has been by far the best experience I’ve had during a dentist visit, since a teenager. Every visit has been amazing and very welcoming. I Definitely will be referring people to visit. Thank you again Dr.Hall and the team!

resp.text: Awesome! Its been great getting to know you Courtney!

name: Edward Hauser
text: I have been going there for years . The staff is very friendly and very professional. Dr Hall is a one of a kind . He does procedure without pain. They are also a one day crown provider without any wait and reasonably easy on the pocket. If professional dentistry is what you are seeking call Hall Family Dentistry you won’t be disappointed.

resp.text: Awesome review! Thank you so much.

name: Dez Johnson
text:
Really enjoyed the Staff here. It was fun and amazing to know that this staff went all out to make me feel welcome wanted and important.
They deserve 10 stars

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review! 10 stars it is then!

name: Bob Jernigan
text: We couldn’t be happier with our move. We all love the dentist now. It is the cleanest and most friendly dentist office.

name: Alan Chandler
text: Excellent experience, very thorough! Debbie, the hygienist, was gentle and took her time explaining what she was doing and why! All good things!

name: Debbie Hall
text: The staff is welcoming and caring.  Dr. Hall has a calm professionalism, taking time to explain procedures and never making you feel rushed.

name: Cynthia Trannon
text: Awesome,  lovely atmosphere,  they are all so kind and caring. Will take good care of you.

name: Stephen Guthrie
text: Great place full of good, professional staff.  Dr Hall does a fantastic job!

name: Seth Miller
text: Dr. Hall and staff always do a great job.  Highly recommend.

name: Bobbi Caldwell
text: Just as last time the staff is extremely friendly. Especially now during the times we are in. Quick and efficient, with no long waits. Easy to go on my lunch break and still have some time left over! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a great dentist and such friendly staff to be apart of.

name: marsha hancock
text: I had a very good experience at Hall Dentistry. I was told to let them know when I arrived for my appointment. I did so and was called in immediately. Donna my hygienist did a wonderful job x-raying my teeth, cleaning and checking for any problems. She was very prompt, pleasant and efficient. Dr. Hall came in to recheck my teeth. He too was prompt, friendly and  efficient.  He explained what my x-rays showed and what we needed to watch. I was very pleased with my dental visit and would highly recommend them.

name: F C
text: Great service, friendly, they fit you in when you have an emergency. Dr. Hall takes whatever time necessary to explain what is happening. Excellent quality workmanship.

name: Joy Jager
text: Every one in Dr. Hall’s dentist office is welcoming and kind. The office is beautifully decorated and comfortable, not to mention completely sanitized. Dr. Hall is very considerate to give options of dental treatments without putting any pressure on me or my husband to schedule those treatments. I highly recommend this practice.

name: Alan Cannon
text: Pick a category... any category.  I give them 5 stars across the board!  I'd give more if Google would let me!

name: Glenda Boutwell
text: I have been using Dr Hall over 4 years.  My experience is great .NO PAIN..ALWAYS EXCELLENT CARE...EVERYONE IS VERY FRIENDLY AND TRAINED TO EXCELLENCE WITH MY DENTAL CARE..Dr Hall is a specialist in his dental care. Go visit and you will see why I honestly re commend Dr Josh Hall and his team..CALL TODAY FOR YOUR APPT..

resp.text: Always a pleasure to see you Glenda! Thank you for the kind review!

name: Angela Jester
text: Excellent! Just finished my 3rd visit. Very comfortable and safe during covid pandemic. I also had some issues with my teeth due vomiting with pregnancy and they went above and beyond to help me protect my teeth and help restore what had been done ✅ I’m so thankful for them!

name: John Michael Berna
text: An absolute first class facility!! Leslie, Peyton and Dr.Hall were amazing. The quintessential professionals

name: Patrick Hutton
text:
I needed an emergency fix on a front tooth after my old crown broke off out of state. Dr. Hall was able to squeeze me in the very next day despite how busy they are there. He did an amazing job of reconstructing it. So good, in fact, that I decided to finally get my smile fixed. I've had terrible experiences with dentists in the past, so I've gone a long time without getting the dental care I need. Everyone there was so nice, so professional, and so, so amazing!

I'll update after my next appointment, but so far it's been a wonderful experience! I think I've found a dentist I'll actually want to go back to!

name: randall cox
text:
Through the years Hall Cosmetic & Family Dentistry has taken care of my dental needs. The staff is helpful, friendly and through when processing my insurance claims. As technology changes, the office is constantly up dating their equipment and procedures.  One example is the use of a 3D CAD In-Office Dental Crown Manufacturing unit.  The last crown I had was completed in one visit to include all aspects of the crowning process.

I would highly recommend Hall Cosmetic & Family Dentist for your dental needs

name: Russell Wood
text: The staff and doctor was very knowledgeable and friendly. I would recommend them to anyone I knew.

name: Jacey Evans
text: This place is amazing they make your teeth white like a brand new car they fix your teeth as sone as possible!

name: Macie Wilkins
text: I had an amazing first appointment at Hall dentistry. I was looking for a dentist who did cosmetic dentistry and his reviews were great, and my first visit was very impressive. The dental hygienist was kind and explained what and why certain things were done (xrays, gum measuring, photos) and Dr. Hall himself was very kind. Being a UAB dental grad, I knew I could trust him. Overall, I expect a lot from my dentist due to complex dental conditions, and Dr. Hall and Debbie (one of the dental hygienists) did not disappoint!

name: Jeff Garth
text: Dr. Hall is a fantastic dentist that takes time to get to know each patient and deliver pain free dental work. The staff in the clinic are super friendly and work quickly to get you in. My hygienist (Donna) has a lot of experience, is very personable & always does a fantastic job. I highly recommend Dr. Hall and his entire practice.

name: Samantha Stewart
text: Dr. Hall is wonderful, he's great at what he does and very gentle. I have a phobia of needles and the drill and he put me at ease and offered sedation, they're very friendly and a great place to go for all of your dental needs. 10/10 would recommend

name: Robert Armbrester
text: I was pleased with my experience but I felt like your prices were not in line with the products.

name: Harold Williamson
text: Great dentist office. They always do a great.

name: Elizabeth Cooley
text: I had an EXCELLENT visit. This was one of the best dental experiences I have ever had at a dentist office. I am not a big fan of going to the dentist, but because it is something that has to be done, Dr. Joshua Hall’s practice is where I will continue go for all my dental needs.

name: Bridget Broadhead
text: Dr. Hall & his staff go the extra mile to make sure you feel comfortable.

name: Lauren Smith
text: My experience at Dr. Hall’s Dentistry has been the same every single time. They are consistent, timely, and such pleasant people to be around. I can come in with a confidence that I’m going to be taken care of, and I have always trusted in their professional opinions and advice. I have been coming here for years now, and have never had any issues. I can’t imagine going anywhere else. I would recommend this office to everyone I know in the Birmingham area who is looking for a GREAT dentist.

name: Conrad Brown
text: They are very professional and friendly. Attention to detail and always explaining next steps to make you feel comfortable.

name: Jasmine Mims
text: This place has such a great atmosphere and smiling faces. They always answer calls which is a huge plus. My hygienist, Donna, made me feel so comfortable as a new patient. She also made sure to keep me very informed during my visit. I recommend 10/10!!!

name: Garrett Williams
text: Love this place!! They are very professional clean and always remember everything about you!

name: William Lemons
text: The staff at Hall Dentistry is always efficient, professional, and courteous. They remember you as returning patient and treat you like a friend!! Dr Hall is outstanding... personable, professional, and patient-focused in his approach. On the rare occasion you need a referral, he and his staff reach out to specialists promptly on your behalf and often same day care is expedited. Highly recommend!!

name: Allison Turner
text: I had such a positive first experience at Hall Family Dentistry! A friend who has been a patient there for quite some time recently recommended them to me, and I couldn’t be more impressed! The staff and Dr. Hall were all extremely kind, made me feel comfortable, and were so helpful and engaging with any questions that I had!

name: Mike Dove
text: I feel that I was fortunate to find the great people of the Hall Family Dentistry. Hygienist Debbie totally educated me on how to take care of my teeth with information I had never heard. Then Leslie took care of me very efficiently regarding a crown issue I had. The atmosphere of the place is quite welcoming and professional. You come out feeling better than you did when you entered. Check them out.

name: Eston Cobb
text: I came as a new patient and received the most thorough oral exam I've ever had. They even took photos of individual teeth to show me problem areas. Incredibly friendly staff! Debbie did an excellent job cleaning my mouth and was so kind and gentle. I will be back!

name: Rob Hottel
text: This a great place to have all your dental needs met!  Dr. Hall and his staff do a great job.

name: Chasity Skinner
text:
I’ve been a dental assistant and temp assistant for 5 years, and a current full-time dental hygiene student. Being in the dental field, I’ve seen my fair share of dental work. I met Dr. Hall and his team a little over a year ago while temping and helping out. After helping over a week, I saw what an amazing job he did on his fillings and crowns. I told myself, “If I ever needed work done, I’m coming here.” Well, fast forward a year later, and I have a small crack in my tooth. Dr. Hall fit me into the schedule and wanted to be as conservative as possible with restoring my tooth, which is what you WANT! I’m lucky I don’t need a crown yet, and only a tiny filling, but If and when I will need a crown, I will be seeing Dr. Hall and his team.
His team is wonderful, not only to their patients, but to each other. Everyone is so kind!

name: Melanie Averill
text: Being new to the Birmingham area gave me numerous choices for a new dentist.  Dr. Hall and his staff are at the top of my list!  Every exam is very thorough and professional.  I am very pleased with the decision to make Dr. Hall our family dentist.

name: Boyd Forsyth
text: Dr Hall and staff are very professional and kind, always had good work done, no complaints, very satisfied every time I go, I would highly recommend to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you Boyd!

name: tan lankford
text:
The Best team in Birmingham, AL
Love y’all!👍🙏🏻💕

name: Ann Coyle
text: Although the staff, generally speaking, is nice (not a fan of the sarcastic hygienist), they billed my insurance company on a plan I no longer had (so they effectively were paid twice for the same work). I begged them to correct it--they didn't--then BCBS caught it and I had to pay the difference (for work I wouldn't have had done if I'd known the real cost up front). Beyond that, I just left the office of my NEW dentist where I found out I will have to spend nearly $10,000 to correct the 2 crowns Dr. Hall did. Again, he's a nice guy, but if you need something beyond whitening, I recommend you find a better dentist.

name: Olivia Schor
text: My dental hygienist, Donna was ABSOLUTELY the best! I went to the appointment with severe anxiety thinking about all the dental work that was going to have to be done on my teeth to repair them from years of neglect. There is no way I could have gotten through my appointment without her kindness and all the sensitive she treated me with while cleaning my teeth. Lindsey Schor

name: Megan Miles
text: Dr. Hall was recommended by several of his other patients and I haven't looked elsewhere since. He's reasonable with his diagnoses so you can be confident it's what's best for you--and your wallet. His staff are great...shout out to Donna, a team hygienist who makes an effort to know you personally. And the outcome is perfect every time. Good color matching, bite alignment, and no pain.

name: Sherry Bomb
text: They are always friendly and explain everything very well.  Their work is top quality.  I love my new smile!

name: Mary Greene
text: I was saying in a very timely manner and diagnosed with a problem that was in need of attention nobody else could pinpoint except Dr. Hall and his fine staff are most appreciative I recommend them highly to everyone very thankful

name: Amanda Nuessle
text: Always so nice and courteous.  As clean as can be and my dental hygienist took every precaution for keeping both of us safe.  I feel like they remember me and actually care about my life outside of my dental health. My teeth love them and I do too!

name: Marianne Wiener
text: Great dental office!  Dr. Hall, his staff and his facility are top notch.  I had an emergency appointment during Covid.  They took every precaution to ensure safety.  Dr. Hall is on the leading edge of dentistry and I would highly recommend him.  He and his staff are kind, caring and very knowledgeable.

name: Penelope Vines
text:
I have been going to Dr Hall's dental office for several years. When I moved to the area, I asked a friend, who has beautiful teeth, which dentist she uses.  I have been going to Dr. Hall since.  Everyone in his office is always helpful and cheerful. This is the first time in my life that I am proud of my smile.
Thank you Dr. Hall and your team of professionals.

name: Lynn Souissi
text: I can’t say that I love going to the dentist but I don’t mind going to Dr. Hall. Everyone there is super friendly, and I always receive excellent tooth care. If you are looking for a dentist that will go above and beyond any other dentist out there then give  them a call. I did😊

name: Courtney Berg
text: I had a great first experience at the office. All of the staff is very friendly. Dr. Hall took his time, made me feel comfortable, and gave a lot of information. I would recommend Dr. Hall to anyone needing a dentist.

name: Ashley Brooke
text: I can not stress enough how great Dr. Hall and his entire team are! I neglected going to the dentist for many years because of the anxiety it caused me, but when it finally got to the point I could no longer avoid going, I did some research and browsing online, then decided to give Hall Cosmetic & Family Dentistry a try... and it was the best decision I’ve ever made! I’ve now been a patient for a few years and I plan on being his patient for many years to come! Dr. Hall and the entire staff are friendly, caring, and personable... and they truly care about every patient that walks through the doors! He has truly transformed my smile and has improved my overall dental health and I’m forever grateful for it! ♥️

name: Nicole Curry
text: I had a wonderful experience. They were very companionate and concerned with my well being. They diagnosed me and made an effective plan for me within a hour.

name: Martin Doxey Jr
text: Always friendly and supportive and work around a busy schedule. Even during times like this, the service did not take a hit and although there are additional precautionary steps, there is still this genuine feel of being part of a family. Dr. Hall and his staff do an excellent job!

name: Allie Crowley
text: I was met with warm welcomes & smiles the second I stepped through the door. The staff here are not only warm & friendly, but also attentive & focused on giving you the best care. Debbie was my dental hygienist & she is the best at her job! Not only was she super friendly & personable, she also explains what procedures she is doing to you so that you are aware of what is happening, as well as being educated at the same time. I would recommend this dentist office to anyone & everyone!!

name: Gwynne Price
text: Excellent place to go. Everyone is very friendly, and they are very thorough.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Jo Ann Davis
text: Dr Hall and his staff are wonderful!  Debbie makes having my teeth cleaned something I look forward to. I highly recommend Hall Cosmetic  & Family Dentistry.

name: Rhonda Bonds
text: Very Friendly and accommodating staff,   As a person terrified of dentist, they did everything to calm my nerves.

name: Heather Rainey
text: I feel very fortunate to have found this practice!

name: Eleanor Sandusky
text: Everyone is very pleasant and courteous. Always on time. Dr Hall very efficient and on target with problems that I come to the office with. Debbie is efficient as well in cleaning and checking my teeth. Always a pleasure to see here and chat a bit.

resp.text: Thank you! Debbie will be thrilled to see this.

name: david young
text: Vanessa dine an awesome job.

name: Bobby Douglass
text: I can’t say enough about how great everyone at Halls Dentistry is! They do a fantastic job with my wife and our kids, and making going to the dentist an enjoyable experience!

name: Kiersten McIntyre
text: I just had my first appointment with this office and it was the best experience I've had at the dentist. The entire staff was friendly and welcoming. They were extremely patient with all of my questions and took the time to explain everything thoroughly. I was impressed with the cleanliness of the facility and their commitment to maintaining safe practices to prevent the spread of the coronavirus. name: CheaperHooker
text: I grew up extremely poor and even a doctors visit was a luxury! Went to the good ole health department dentist when I was 15 to get teeth pulled to give wisdom teeth room to grow in...absolute nightmarish experience so I've sadly been terrified of the dentist ever since then, like NO!! Fast forward 22 years and I had to force myself to finally go due to what I thought were fairly minor issues that needed addressed. Referred to Dr. Hall by a friend based on my known extreme fear. These people are fantastic and my hygienist, Mrs. Donna, couldn't have made me feel any more comfortable 😁 X-rays, pics, and a very thorough cleaning/scrape were performed on my first visit along with an overall smile assessment. Luckily I have only a few minor fillings to be done, 2 small pits to be filled in, and only 1 wisdom tooth that will have to be extracted. I'm just still amazed that I'm actually looking forward to going back soon to work towards getting my pretty smile completely back 🤷🏻‍♂️ Wonderful place!!

name: Victoria Pollock

I never thought I would say this, but I was able to relax some yesterday-I really do think that was because Brittney and Dr. Hall were there (the “happy gas” really does work when you relax!).  Dr. Hall even sent back my, original, “permanent” because he wanted it to be perfect.  And it is.

Each person I interacted with made sure I was comfortable and calm, and they explained everything and made sure I understood. I definitely recommend them, especially if you are someone that gets nervous easily or has avoided the dentist.

name: Em
text: Amazing environment and people. They squeezed me in the same day my appointment was cancelled at another dentist. All of the staff is sweet and welcoming. Cat and Dr Cook were the people that assisted me. They gave me a consultation on my failing rootcanals and helped me find a solution. Super kind and helpful. And they even gave me an awesome bag with a pen of my favorite color 😁. Best service I've ever had! I am definitely going to continue using them for my dental needs.

resp.text: Thanks Em for your kind words!

name: Erin Camp-Meeks
text: I have a severe dental phobia and this office was so helpful and understanding.  The technician talked me through everything and was very kind.  The environment in the office is calming.  It really helped me reduce anxiety and feel more comfortable.  I would definitely recommend this office to anyone with dental anxiety or who needs a gentler touch.

text: My experience with Twickenham Family Dentistry has been great. After having wore braces for years, taking care of your teeth is very important. Dr Cook is the best dentist I’ve known. Anytime I need to change my appointment, Terry is right there to help. Thank you Dr Cook and Twickenham Family Dentistry for taking care of my family’s teeth.

text: I've been a patient here for 5-6 years and always have a flawless experience. Stephanie at the front desk is amazing. Dr. Cook is very thorough and takes his time with his patients. Love the small office feel and knowing the staff by name. I always recommend this office to my friends.

Dr. Cook was thorough in explaining the procedure I needed and discussed all my options. He is wonderful. His assistant Mindy was terrific and supportive. Thanks to all of them, I am much happier with my smile!

name: Holly Doll
text: I found Dr. Cook by accident when I was experiencing tooth pain and didn’t have a family dentist. He diagnosed and repaired my tooth quickly and painlessly. I highly recommend his office. He is now my go-to tooth guy.

name: Daniel Cooper
text: Dr. Cook and his staff go above and beyond to make the patient feel warm and welcomed.  Dr. Cook is always so polite and professional.  I am so glad I found his practice and look forward to my next visit.

name: Jay Hughes
text:
Best dentist I’ve ever found! And Stephanie is the best! Hands down!

Update!
I wanted to wait to post the final review. But here it is.
I would like to say “sorry” to Lindsey. You are a great person and I’m sorry for the way I treated you.

Now, to Dr. Cook and his staff. These fine folks took me in and actually listened to me and what I wanted. We were in the same page from day one. I would recommend this Doctor and his staff to anyone needing dental work! Hands DOWN!! There has been full transparency throughout every visit! The best Christmas present I could ever give myself, a smile full of teeth and I owe that to Dr. Cook and his staff! Thank you guys for understanding what I needed and what I could afford and helping me achieve my dental goals!

They didn’t act like it was a chore to be there and I could tell they genuinely wanted to help me. Cat and Dr. Cook are amazing! And the lady at the front, i think her name was Elizabeth if I remember correctly, was so helpful and sweet too! I will be recommending people to come here for sure! I loved my visit here!!!

I'm very pleased with the work I've received and will be going to him until I lose all my teeth and then I will go to him to take care of my gums😁

text: Love Dr. Cook and his entire staff. I had a tooth break on a weekend and called to just leave a message for Monday morning. name: Erica Clem
text: Cindy is my hygienist and she is the best! I followed her here and we have enjoyed the atmosphere. You can feel confident that your getting the best oral care.5 stars!

name: Larry n Heidi Burger
text:
I started with Dr Cook 3 years ago.   I have a terrible fear of the dentist.  I mean the kind of paralyzing, crying kind of fear.   My mom was a dental assistant when I was a kid and she was always with me.  As an adult she still went with me.  When she passed away I just didn’t go back..

I had an issue and found Dr Cooks office.   I shared my fear and they put me at ease.  They didn’t make me feel childish or crazy.  He is amazing.  He takes his time to relax you with his sense of humor and he is gentle.   Another thing that may not matter to you but it did to me, he has a strong faith.  You can feel that being around him.  I feel I could go to anyone in that office with a fear or concern and they would talk me thru it.  Or even pray thru it if that is what was needed.

While this is his practice it’s a team effort.  He has the best staff.  Everyone in the office is there working together.  They feel like a family and make you apart of that.

An example... While in the office I got a call that a family member had passed, one of the ladies sent a sympathy card.  Another time after some serious dental work they called on a weekend just to check on me.

You can not go wrong by choosing Dr Cook and his staff...

name: Jerry

My hygienist (Cindy Smith) is very professional and makes each visit for a checkup as enjoyable as anyone could hope for.

name: Jason Miller
text: Dr. Cook and Cyndi are amazing. Have been with them for years. They make dentistry visits a pleasure.

name: David Attig
text:
Edit: Since I guess you want details, the reasons for me not visiting your practice again and leaving the least number of stars available are separate.

Not visiting anymore:
My tooth was in no pain at all until you prepared it for a crown.  The pain persisted after placing the permanent crown (on the second try, and it still did not look great on the X-ray).  I gave up on you as a dentist after the third or fourth bite-adjustment that did not solve the problem.  On the most recent visit (after my new dentist told me to go back to the person who placed the crown to get it re-done), you said that this crown is "perfect" and told me to go to an endodontist.  You also mentioned that you had told me before that the root could be damaged from previous tooth decay - you had not told me this about this specific tooth in the past, only a different tooth on which you had already performed a root canal.  According to the endodontist that did perform a root canal, the roots were in good shape - there is a crack in my tooth underneath the crown, which was the source of pain whenever debris got in the crack and irritated the root.  Whether this crack was because of a poor bite when I first got the crown or something else, I guess I'll never know.

Zero Stars: You lied to me.  I am listing several instances here, in no particular order:

1.  As I already mentioned, you did not discuss this tooth and its root with me in the past as you stated at the most recent visit.  The assistant at that visit even looked for it in the chart notes and could not find it .

2.  After the insurance claim for the crown was denied the final time, I asked you about the dentist's narrative on why it was necessary that should have been included in the files that were sent to the insurance.  You said you typed a full page for this, your receptionist said it was a few lines handwritten.  Neither of you could find a copy to provide to me.  When I was filing the appeal to the insurance company a few months prior, I asked if there was a narrative, and was not made aware that such a thing existed.  One or both of you lied directly to my face.
* If you did not file anything because I was on the "patient appreciation plan" which states that you won't file insurance while I'm on it, you could have told me that and I would not have had an issue.  This was why I filed insurance on my own after paying you for the procedure, expecting them to reimburse me the covered percentage of what I paid; admittedly, I did not realize the amount of paperwork and effort needed for this.  Instead your office told me that you did file all the needed paperwork, which the insurance company never received.

3.  I'm not even convinced that this crown was necessary (and there apparently is no narrative to state that it was).  Your office seems to put a higher priority on crowns and other high-dollar work than on fillings, which seems backwards to me as I would think that you would want to do a filling as soon as you find it so the tooth does not get bad enough to need a crown.  Another tooth of mine which you said would need a crown (which I never got from you because the pain on the other side of my mouth never stopped) currently has a filling from my new dentist.

4.  You said an endodontist can remove and save the old crown to place it back on later.  This is incorrect, both endodontists I visited stated that they drill through the crown to perform the root canal.  This may not have been intentional, but I'm counting it as another lie.

5.  After I got the root canal, some porcelain chipped off of another surface of the crown.  I called your office to ask about what material the base metal is (and if I should worry about corrosion) and was told that ALL the crowns you perform are pure zirconium and not porcelain-on-metal.  When I asked how that could be if mine clearly has exposed metal, the person on the phone got quite defensive ... like accusations of lying (perhaps not unfounded) is a common phenomenon.

resp.text:
David, I'm sorry you are unhappy. I do hope you at least realize we tried our best to provide all the Care that we could. If you don't mind, as you leave us one star would you mind elaborating on what you wish we had done better? That would be helpful for me and anyone reading this. However, respecting your privacy, I don't want to elaborate on what I think your experience may have been.

Update: David, I am so happy that you have found a new dentist with a relationship that you have confidence and Trust in! Thank you for taking the time to share this with me.  It will do neither you nor I any good for me to make a defense of the experiences that we had together. I'll leave it at I am so sorry for the misunderstandings we had and I wish it had gone otherwise. I do wish you the best going forward.
Sincerely,
Brian Cook

name: Andy Walburg
text:
Go to this dentist... And I'm not a relative, I swear.
I live in Austin Texas and was visiting Huntsville and had a dental emergency. My crown post broke and I was left without a front tooth. I went to Dr. Cook for options and after extensive discussion decided to put a new post in and a temporary crown so my dentist at home could then replace the temporary with a new crown. But when Dr Cook got into the process he discovered an old-school resin that had been used  to fill the root canal and determined that the chances of success for a new crown were significantly reduced. Rather than continuing with the new post, he simply glued the old crown back in place and suggested that I discuss my options with my dentist at home. Wow... He had the opportunity to charge me for a new post that probably would have been unsuccessful but instead was honest and told me that I would probably need an implant.
Patient before profits. For me this is something significant and something I was extremely impressed by. On top of all of that, the office was friendly, extremely organized, and seamless throughout the entire process. I highly highly recommend Dr. Cook if you happen to be fortunate enough to live in an area where he can provide dental services for you.

resp.text: Andy, thank you for the kind words. Good luck with your your dentist on Monday!

name: Tegan Guillebeau
text: I absolutely loved Dr. Cook! You can tell he and all of his staff definitely care for the well being of their patients and are willing to go that extra mile to let their patients know they're in good hands and to ensure they receive an intimate and thorough visit. Best dentist in Huntsville!

resp.text: Tegan, we appreciate you and are so encouraged by that review.  thank you for posting!

name: Vinnie Athey
text: The best!

name: Stephen Wisener
text: I would give more than 5 stars if I could. Dr. Cook and his staff were amazing. I was extremely nervous coming in, not having been to a dentist a total of maybe three times my entire life. They went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable and explained every procedure they needed to do. Very kind and knowledgeable. Thank you guys!!

resp.text: Thank you Stephen! We don't mind if you are a little nervous coming in, just proud you decided to.

name: David
text: Dr. Cook and the entire staff are wonderful and do great work. They really care about their patients. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: David, we appreciate your confidence!

name: Bob J
text: Nothing but success with Dr. Cook and his entire staff. Very professional and always friendly. I can't imagine a better dental experience than what I've received there! And his community outreach is exceptional.

resp.text: Bob, your review is so kind.  thank you for posting!

name: Justin Goldman
text:
OUTSTANDING CARE! On July 18th I had 12 teeth pulled all at once, on the path to detures. Dr. Cook AND his assistant (wish I could remember her name, she was very supportive) were extremely professional, and gentle (as far as that can go) and gave me all the attention and patience one could ask for, (torwards the end I got a little impatient)...Dr. cook took his time and fully explained his answers to ALL of my questions. But I digress...bottom line I would and have recommended Dr. Cook to ANYONE looking for good and affordable dental work.
-Justin Goldman

resp.text:
Justin, only a champion can say such kind things about the folks who just got through taking those teeth out!  Thank you for taking the time to build us up and please you know you made our day reading this.
Brian Cook and team

name: Timothy Culver
text: Very professional and courteous will not go anywhere else

resp.text: Timothy, we are proud you are with us!

text: Had two root canals done by Dr Cook, no more pain for me. Everyone is so kind and sweet at Twickenham Family Dentistry! Thank you for your work and patience.

resp.text: Shawnna,  we appreciate you and how sweet you are every time you come in.  thank you for posting!

text:
Dr. Cook is honest, caring and has the state of the art dentistry equipment and a great staff.
He has been my primary care dentist for more than 10 years, and I couldn't be happier. Even though I travel around because of my work, I make sure to always go back to his office for my dental checkup.

resp.text: We love taking care of your family.  You guys have supported us from the very beginning and we are grateful for you all.

name: Shawnna Kent

text:
Dr. Cook and his staff definitely go over and beyond to work with each patient making sure the patient gets the service needed.  After the former Dr. retired I needed additional work on an angry tooth.  I came back in for a check up and was welcomed by Dr. Cook.  Dr. Cook immediately worked me in his schedule to see me and took his time to take care of the problem....not only took care of the problem but waived the fee! Praise the Lord! ha.  Dr. Cook along with his staff genuinely care for the well being of each patient and genuinely have hearts to serve!
-Allie

resp.text: Allie, hope you are doing great with all your new opportunities.  Thanks for your review and the chance to take care of you.

text: Professional, kind, welcoming, personable...there are a lot of adjectives you can use to describe Dr. Cook's office and staff and they're all positive. You can tell they care about their patients by their investment in the patient experience; they've always got something new that makes the experience less intrusive and uncomfortable than I remember dentistry being even in more recent years, be it ways to watch an iPad and Netflix during a dental procedure to tools for quicker/more comfortable x-rays. I've recommended Twickenham Family Dentistry to all my friends.

resp.text: Andrew, you guys have supported us from the beginning, Thank you so much!

name: Ebone Patterson
text: I never have had a dental experience like this! The staff are so friendly and professional! Dr. Barnett is amazing and really cares about his staff and patients! The whole dental office from front to back is clean and sanitized. They offer warm blankets in case you are cold and it’s just overall and wonderful atmosphere! I highly recommend to make an appointment and be apart of the Divine family!

resp.text: Ebone, thank you for your amazing review! We really appreciate your kind words!

name: Kiahna Mollette
text:
I have always been very selective of my dentists due to pretty severe dental anxiety. I've been coming to Divine Expressions for approximately 6 months now and I have always had a great experience! I've had cleanings, fillings, and wisdom teeth extraction and always left satisfied. My fillings were always 100% pain free and I found that I didn't even need any anxiety reducing measures, as everyone made me incredibly comfortable. My cleaning was amazing, Roxy is one of the nicest people I've ever met. I very recently had my wisdom teeth removed and I felt no pain and didn't even need to take pain medicine afterwards. I used sedation for this and I didn't have an ounce of anxiety before, during, or after. The office is very focused on what your goals are with your smile as well as keeping your mouth healthy.
I would recommend Divine Expressions to anybody that is searching for a dentist, I actually look forward to dental appointments here!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Kiahna! Your review made our entire team happy!

name: Crystal Smith
text: Dr. Barnett is amazing! He is the first dentist I’ve been to that eases my anxiety. I don’t dread going in for procedures. His work is meticulous, yet quick. I feel totally at ease in his care. His staff is also very kind and welcoming. The office is inviting and beautifully decorated as well.  I rarely ever write reviews, but I’m THAT pleased with Divine Expressions. 10 out of 10 recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Crystal!!!

name: Larry Miller
text: Unbelievably professional environment.  Much more advanced equipment than I've seen at any other office.  It's a lifesaver finding this place and getting the best quality care out there.

resp.text: Larry, thank you so much for this amazing review!

name: Jay Dub
text: Impersonal, impatient, and overall unsatisfactory service. Be warned this is a profit oriented, Cosmetic dentist. I do not recommend at all due to the lack of care and attention to detail provided. If your looking for a permanent solution to your dental needs look elsewhere as this dentist will rush you in and out... also, when you get a list of what he claims needs to be addressed, do yourself a favor and Seek a 2nd opinion. D- dental practice at best.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write us about your concerns. Our core mission is to go above and beyond in everything we do, and every patient that walks through our doors is valued. If we missed the mark in any way, we would like to talk more about it. We are unable to find you as a patient of record to contact you so please give our office a call at your earliest convenience to discuss this further.  We look forward to speaking with you.

name: Kristen Mack
text: I absolutely hate going to the dentist and this was a walk in the park. Everybody is extremely nice and knowledgeable. They definitely see the value in educating their clients and making sure you’re comfortable. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Kristen!

name: J Ransaw
text: Divine Expressions is the epitome of greatness. The entire staff was courteous and kind. They provided an experience at a dentist visit I’ll never forget, with all the high tech gadgets and viewing devices. My technician ROXY is the best, very knowledgeable and genuinely cares about the well being of your oral health.

resp.text: Thank you. We are so glad we left such a positive lasting impression on you. See you at your next visit with us!

name: Julia Chambers
text: The services that I receive from Janine was excellent. Dr. Barnett and the staff are friendly. They ensured that I was properly informed about my dental health care. I would have no qualms in recommending them to family and friends. Please Please make your appointment today with Divine Expressions, you will not regret it. Excellent service!!

resp.text: Julia, thank you so much for the great review! That's so kind of you to say!

name: RoJay Armstead
text: Divine Expressions has taken care of me and my oral health for a few years now and every experience is a pleasant one. The staff is super friendly and always punctual when it comes to executing my appointments. They never hesitate to make sure everything I need is taken care of.

resp.text: RoJay this is so wonderful of you to say and we deeply appreciate your great review!

name: Kim Owens
text: Since my last dentist of 14yrs closed down, I've been looking for a new dentist that makes me feel comfortable and at home. Well I believe I found that here at Divine Expressions. The staff welcomed me with open arms and treated me like family and with respect.  The place is very clean and everyone is very professional.  Usually I dread going to the dentist,  but now I am actually looking forward to it! Thank you for helping me find the right Dentistry group for me!

resp.text: Kim, what a kind and thoughtful review! Thank you so much, we appreciate hearing that.

name: Melanie Rowe
text: I’m a new patient and I was actually a little afraid coming because it’s been a while since I’ve gotten my teeth treated but I must say that this was the most pleasant visit I’ve ever had at a dentist office. Shout out to miss Latoya Baker for making me SO comfortable and taking care of me while I got treated. I highly recommend this place and I will definitely be scheduling monthly visits!

resp.text: Melanie, this is such a wonderful review! Thank you!

name: Garrett Chapin (Lilly's Prayer Corner)
text: The people were so friendly and helpful. They made everything so painless from procedures to paperwork. This is going to become my new dentist

resp.text: Awesome!  We are so glad to become your forever Dental home!

name: Samona Jones
text:
Divine Expression is a good dentist practice I would highly recommended. I needed a root canal and crown. Dr Barnett and his staff did an amazing job. The hygienist were amazing, billing staff amazing, and Dr Barnett very precise with his work. The office is very modern and I love the scriptures and soft music throughout the setting. I thought it was very cool for them to have the ability to print the crown in house instead of sending it off (like most dentist offices). The technology being used in today’s society is out this world and Dr Barnett seems to have the latest. One of the things I love the most about my visit is the bedside manners. I received a phone call after hours personally from Dr Barnett making sure I was ok and wasn’t having any complications. I’ve never in my life received that type of service and it really was the highlight of my visit.
Divine Expression is highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you Samona for your recommendation and we are so glad to have you as part of the Family!

name: Gary white
text:
Terrible place to go! Dr Barnett did a hack job on my mouth and his crew laughed about it! I call constantly for resolve and they do little to help make it right. After my crown I was in pain for weeks coming there 3 or 4 times and not getting a proper fit. I had to go to a specialist 2 hrs away from home because they were not comfortable doing a root canal.

Afterwards they did little to follow up with me and when I call the receptionist on the phone have no idea what they are talking about or how patient in need. They have maybe 2 people out of the entire crew that were pleasant to deal with but the rest are trash! BEWARE AND DO NOT GO HERE!!!

resp.text: We apologize for your experience it definitely was not our intent. Unfortunately there was miscommunication about the needed root canal as we did not refer you to someone else or feel uncomfortable doing it.  As for someone on the team laughing at you we will listen to the calls because that doesn’t sound like the character or integrity of any of our team members and doesn’t align with the vision of our practice.  We work really hard to work with our patients and provide the care they deserve and need when allowed to.  Thank you for your feedback as we view all feedback as an opportunity for growth.

name: Shambria Davis
text: Always a great experience when I visit. My appt. was at 8am and they got me in and out by 9:30a. They ensure to implement COVID precaution which I felt was an added bonus. Overall amazing experience with the patients care in HUGE consideration.

resp.text: Thank you Shambria!!

name: madonna noble
text: This is the worse place by far Dr. Barnett is not professional at all and doesn’t care or listen to his patients. I would recommend staying away from him and this dentist office it’s by far the worse. Let’s just say I have never had to push a doctor off me until I met Dr.Barnett.

resp.text: Exceptional patient care is our standard in our office, we apologize we were not able to help take you out of pain during your visit.  We wish you the best of luck in your dental care.

name: Melissa Causey
text: Like other reviews I had a bit of a wait but soon as you walk in its so peaceful and welcoming, combined with the exceptional service this is definitely my dentist of choice now. And like most folks I'm not fond of the dentist! Thank you Divine Expressions 👍👍👍👍

resp.text: Awe thank you so much. We are so glad you had this experience.  See you soon!

I was so thoroughly pleased, I’m bringing my son tomorrow. Professionalism and service at its apex.

name: celleste landrum
text: Today was my first visit as a new patient. My experience was the best I've ever had at a dentist office, and I've had a lot of work done in the past! Latoya was very informative and SO nice, she helped me understand my treatment plan and made the entire process so easy and not stressful at all. Dr. Barnett was so friendly and professional! Alicia assisted with my billing and payment options, and was so helpful and friendly. I am someone who struggles with dental anxiety because I've had so much work done and they made the entire process stress free. The facility is very clean and so nice. I will be recommending my fiance and sister to this office! Thank you so much! Can't wait to come back!

resp.text: Celleste, this was wonderful to read. Thank you for sharing!

name: Taric Alani
text:
Pros: The place was clean, and I liked how they asked me to wash my hands as soon as I came inside. I saw everyone wearing masks. This was much better hygienic practice than I have seen in other offices in the area. The dentist was friendly and explained everything clearly.

Cons: They didn't have any of my paperwork, my dental records from my previous dentist, my sleep study for my dental oral appliance, not even my new patient paperwork, which I filled out online on their website weeks beforehand. I had called several times both to my other providers as well as here to organize everything before I arrived, several weeks in advance. They just dropped the ball and claimed they were having internet issues, which is just a lousy excuse easily remedied in a day, not one that takes weeks to resolve. I won't likely be returning, because even though I had the electronic referral done via my physician and got their information from my insurance, Blue Cross Blue Shield, they don't accept Blue Cross Blue Shield, because they don't have the software to bill to medical insurance. That's just unacceptable in this day and age. If you're a approved provider as shown on that insurance company's website, you should accept their insurance or else ask that insurance company not to list you as a provider.

resp.text: We apologize that things weren’t as they should have been for you.  Also we have made a decision because it’s a handful dealing with dental insurance to not file medical insurance however you can always file and get reimbursed and we would be happy to give you all documentation that you need to do so.

name: Ezekiel Bolden
text: The follow up calls from the doctor himself got me. He made me feel like me being his patient really mattered. I’m recommending this dentistry to all my friends and family. His dental work is awesome as well.

resp.text: Ezekiel, we are so pleased to read your wonderful review! Thank you!

name: seth adgate
text: Let me start off by saying my past experiences with dentists has been awful. Every time I've had any work done I have felt pretty much everything and even told the dentist and they didn't seem to care. Everything was painful. I was to a point where I would never go to a dentist again, it gave me anxiety, my blood pressure would shoot through the roof and I felt like I just another person in a long line in the waiting room. I can say this is the total opposite here at Divine! Dr. Laurentis made sure I couldn't feel anything, his nurses kept the atmosphere upbeat and had comfort items if I needed anything (warm towel to wash my face, noise cancelling headphones, eye mask, etc,.). I went in for a root canal and a crown and I'm happy to say 1 day after the procedure I'm pain free and the crown fit perfectly. I feel like there is hope for my teeth again since there is finally a dentist I can trust. Thank you to Dr. Laurentis and your staff for everything. See you soon!

resp.text: Thank you Seth. We are so glad to make you comfortable and to have you as a forever patient and part of the family!

name: DeAsia Knight
text: This office simply doesn’t know what they’re doing. I scheduled an appointment specifically for a root canal, only to be told (while I’m sitting in the operating chair) that Dr. Crawford doesn’t feel comfortable performing root canals. Why would you come to a root canal appointment unable to perform the procedure? Also, I thought this was Dr. Barnett’s office. I know that he can perform root canals because he gave my mom one, so why wasn’t he there? They also acted as if they had no idea why I even came to the office. They asked about the pain I was experiencing and why I came in, as if I hadn’t specifically scheduled a root canal. Eventually I was referred to an endodontist specialist after waiting in the chair for 45 minutes. Very displeased with this experience, especially since I scheduled off of work for this appointment.

resp.text: We apologize you had the experience you did.  We will reach out to you on Monday when Dr. Barnett and the full team is in the office to see how we can take better care of you and get you out of pain!

name: Jake King
text: Tried to set an appointment with a very rude and unprofessional secretary.I had to call back to because I had some wrong info and they wouldn't answer after 3 calls and a left message to no reply. Finally got answers on the 4th just to be told they didn't hold my appointment and I can't get in until Jan then told me before I said anything how it wasn't there fault I had to call back. I never placed any blame just wanted to set an appointment won't be trying again

name: Phillip
text: Many are posting about the excellent service, which it was, but I must shine a light on the disastrous treatment I received when it came to insurance. I walked in with Blue Cross and Blue Shield, but the manager involved kept telling me I only had health insurance. I have insurance through my job, so I know this is incorrect. They compromised by making me pay upfront and claiming they would pay me back when the claim came through. It has now been a month and I have not heard one thing about my money or my claim. During this time I have called my insurance, who tried to call them, but had to hang up as the manager put the claims adjuster on hold for over ten minutes with out answering any questions. Continually when I call to talk to the manager, I am told she is out of the office and when she does call back tells me it is the insurance's fault. I will not be returning and would not recommend this establishment to anyone else.

resp.text: We have looked into your history and will be contacting you soon.

Exceptional Quality Service and Experience... I have been a longtime patient at Divine Expressions, the entire staff is professional, attentive, and more importantly caring. In addition, the staff is extremely precautious in escorting patients throughout the dental clinic.  If you are in search of finding a new dentist or would like leave your current dentist, Dr. Barnett and his team is a Go-To! From the receptionist at the front Desk Alecia, (so Bubbly and such a Joy to see) to team of Dental Hygienist and Dental Assistants,   I literally feel like family, when I arrive.

Not to mention, the ambience in the dental office embodies tranquility, and get this, you can inhale calming scents while your teeth are cleaned or maintenance is performed, all while watching Netflix, YESSS Netflix in the Dental Office, I love telling my peers, I have a dentist appoint and I get to watch Netflix and chill, while my teeth are being cleaned....

Superb experience, you will not be disappointed...

name: Sarah Brown
text:
April15, 2019

The moment I walked through the front doors, I felt the love ❤️ in the atmosphere. I continued and met to beautiful young ladies at the front desk, smiling at me, Alecia and Caitie that made the journey a little more welcoming. Alecia went a step further by being professional and giving. She gave me a grand tour of the elegant facility and what they had to offer. Alecia introduced me to other staff members and enlightened me on what their jobs consisted of. Dr. Barnett is a complete gentleman and very professional. Last but not least the beautiful lady that took care of me so gracefully, Mrs. Janine my dental hygienist, she explained everything she was doing and did everything to make sure I was comfortable. She answered every question I had, she was gentle and kind. She made me aware of the things I needed done and what I needed to get my smile back. Dr. Barnett came in to confirm. So far I’m pleased with the service I received today, with Divine Expression Family Dentistry. So to all Tennessee Valley don’t meet me there, beat me there. ❤️❤️❤️❤️ Sarah Bradford.

text: It was my first time here last week and I am IMPRESSED. From the receptionist up to the dentist, everyone was so pleasant. They answered every question I had and I didn’t feel rushed whatsoever. They took their time and took care of me very well. I’m so glad I found them due to me needing a dentistry who does Invisalign-which I will be calling to get that started this week!  The atmosphere was calming and peaceful. name: McKinley Curtis
text: Over the past two weeks, I’ve personally had three opportunities to experience how family dentistry should be. The team of Dr. Barnett and his are professionals.  I’m amazed how much the Divine Expressions Family Dentist has pivoted since the pandemic.  My health is essential, and they ensure that I’m safe throughout the entire process.  As I prepared for the holidays, I provided myself the gift of having my teeth cleaned and fillings that needed immediate attention.  Each visit, I was greeted with smiles and great conversation.  I’ll close and say that the chemistry with each hygienist compliment Dr. Barnett because he doesn’t have to ask for any instruments.  His team knows what he needs to be handed at the right time each time.  May the holiday season continue to shine on all that want healthy smiles!   I’m blessed to have them as my family dentist of choice!

resp.text: We are so glad you are happy with us.

name: Sally Menendez
text:
5 stars for looks, 1 star for respect and dignity of the patient.

The facility is very nice on the outside and inside. They have fancy gadgets and machines, but that does not make up for how they treated me as a patient. Not once walking into that building that I feel comfortable, the dental hygienist was very kind but I always had a vibe that they had to try to sell something to me. I stayed at this facility for about a year and a half just to give it a chance after every six months cleaning. But my last visit was the worst, the doctor was expecting me to pay $1,500 upfront for a procedure he suggested I needed to do. They wanted me to pay for it before I left that day and schedule an appointment. I am not an ATM, and on top of that every time the doctor would see me he would nonchalantly scold me about my teeth. I would leave the facility in embarrassment because of how they thought of me. I also noticed that they treated me differently than they did my husband. We would go at different times and he would tell me how great the the doctor was while I was the one getting scolded.

resp.text: We apologize that your experience was difference than your husbands.  We want to support patients in understanding how their oral health is and when it is contrary to optimal health.  We make it our goal to remind patients of treatment left at each visit as we know that life happens and we forget things.  We also have the policy of making a deposit prior to scheduling.  If you pay in full you receive a discount.  We apologize if that wasn’t explained completely to you.  Additionally our fees are set by the insurance companies we contract with.   Your policy sets the fees and we strictly abide by what your insurance company charges.   We would be happy to discuss this further.  Please give us a call for further clarity and to receive our heartfelt apology.

name: Don Harris
text:
My hygienist was exceptional. I made it through an entire cleaning and she didn't hurt me at all.
Additionally, she was very knowledgeable about the services that the dentist offers at his office. Thanks for a pain-free visit.

resp.text: We are glad your visit was exceptional and pain free!

text:

text: professionalism at its finest. i definitely recommend

name: Stacey Pruitt
text:
I switched to this dentist to be closer to my job. I researched and looked at the reviews. I have never had a bad experience at a dentist office before. I first thought it was weird that they were begging for 5 star reviews when i first started going here. That explains where a lot of these reviews came from.

On each visit I felt like it was more about up-selling you on the products they offer than focusing on my actual teeth. They were always mentioning teeth whitening, special mouth wash, special tooth paste etc. I am in the sales world so I get it, but don't be pushy. You can usually tell when a person is uncomfortable about the topics. Which I was.

I received a quote for invisalign about a year ago, and decided to save. They quoted me 1800ish without insurance for that visit. Then this past visit they quoted me 3,325 after my insurance pays 1000. I thought that was a bit dramatic increase especially since my insurance now covers a grand.

I go to my dentist every 6 months. I might go two months over, due to work scheduling, but I go regularly. I've never had cavity problems so 8 months ago when I was told I had 6 I almost fainted. I actively brush my teeth and floss multiple times a day. My family and friends make fun of how cautious I am when it comes to my oral health. I want to keep my teeth so I do care for them.  I was told I didn't floss enough and that I needed to start when I asked how it was possible to have 6 cavities. I felt like i was being degraded.  So I started brushing 3Xs daily and flossing after every meal. When I came back 8 months later (2 months over because of a work scheduling issue)  I had 4 more. Only then when I almost started to cry did the Dr. ask about my medical history. I have severe acid re-flux. Apparently that can cause the cavity issue. He then up-sales me on some ORA-Care mouth wash and told me to use it until my next visit. When I return to the next visit if I have additional cavities we will re-evaluate. I'm not sure that I would want to wait another 6 months to see if i get additional cavities even while using the mouth wash.

When I went to schedule my filling appointment they told me I had to pay a percentage of the $250 cost before they scheduled me. I told them that I didn't have the money even though I did, and decided right then I would go back to Dr. Sonja Gill's office.

I felt this office is only concerned about the money that goes into their pocket. I get businesses have to make money, but I have never not paid them. Even when I missed an appointment I paid them a $55 no show fee with no hesitation. I felt like I was their personal ATM.

I will never go back to this practice again. I am going back to Dr. Sonja Gill where I am greeted with a smile, and they don't hold out their hand for your credit card every time you walk through the door.

resp.text: We apologize and will be contacting you to see how we can make it better for you.

name: Jennifer Triolo
text: I had my first visit with Divine Expressions yesterday and was thoroughly impressed. The staff was extremely polite and took the time to ensure my comfort. They spent a lot of time with me running diagnostics, answering any questions I had, and showing me around the facility. I will definitely be going back.
