name: Tipawan Gallo
text:
I was a patient since the practice was still known as Horizon PC, and then Divine Expressions. Content with the service, I decided to have Divine Expressions as my primary and only dental care. And for the most part, it was good. The staff are incredibly friendly, extremely accommodating and very gentle during each cleaning. Not to mention the breathtaking, home magazine worthy office.

Where it pains me to write is related to Dr. Laurentis Barnett's procedures. Every procedure that dealt with a crown of some sort, always came off. It resulted in me either having to leave work early, take an extended lunch, take a day off and/or come back multiple times that same week. While the staff and Dr. Barnett was very accommodating and flexible with scheduling, the process were still very inconvenient. A particular case was getting an implant for one of my teeth. For starters, the tooth itself was shaped very oddly. It did not look or feel like a normal tooth. It also always popped off, even though the office used dental cement.

With every visit to either add or replace, I never received an answer as to why this kept happening. Dr. Laurentis also hinted that it was possibly my fault that the tooth kept coming off. I'm not opposed to thinking that I could've been doing something wrong, but after speaking with friends and colleagues with dental implants and explaining to them my daily routine and lifestyle, I was suggested to get an second opinion from another dental professional.

I sought treatment elsewhere and unfortunately had to pay for another tooth implant. The implant printed from Divine Expressions leaves my new dental office with many questions as they have never seen such an odd shaped "tooth". My current implant from my new dentist has been in my mouth for nearly 2 months. I had not returned once for a re-application.

The purpose of this post is not to defame or deface Dr. Laurentis Barnett, it is simply to write a review I felt needed to be written. I wish him and his office the best of success and hope that maybe this review will leave some food for thought. I'm glad there are a good number of patients that are satisfied with his service. I simply was not.

resp.text: We apologize for the inconvenience and will be happy to issue you a refund for the crown and the inconvience it has caused you.

name: Gideon Rah
text: Professional and painless!

resp.text: Gideon, thank you very much!

name: Marissa Jones
text: Let me just say that every time I come to this place they go above and beyond to make sure that I'm comfortable. Like I've had dentists that were just plain awful, rude, and didn't care if they were hurting you while they worked on your teeth. Due to this I have a terrible fear of the dentist but Dr. Barnett(?) and his staff are insanely professional and nice. I never have to wait long. They always work with me for appointments. I had to change my appointment a few days before and they worked me in that very same week on another day! I seriously cannot stress how amazing this place is. If you're on the fence about choosing a dentist, definitely choose Divine Expressions.

resp.text: Thank you

name: K Staten
text: The new office is beautiful. However, I am not pleased with the run around I received as if I didn't know what I was talking about. Every time I called the office in reference to the same tooth/problem I always explained in detail what my concerns were. I repeatedly went in and each time you would think I was a new patient. I saw 4 different dental assistants and none of them had a clue as to why I was there. They didn't even know which tooth that I had a root canal on in there office just 1 month prior (this happened twice). One time I called, I was asked what the doctor told me on the last visit I went in.....this is disturbing considering they should keep record of what the doctor says each visit and overall what is actually going on. Also, it would seem smart to keep record of what a patient says for the reason they are needing to see the doctor again so that there is an overall knowledge with other office staff on the situation/patient. I was always greeted by a friendly smile (wish I could remember her name) but once I got behind the door everything seemed surfaced even with Dr Barnette. Maybe the staffs lack of knowledge was the problem. Not a great experience

resp.text: We apologize for any lack of information you feel you have received.  We have only worked on one tooth so it wasn't so much a lack of knowledge it was ensuring we locate the source of your pain. All notes reflect work done but I request that, just like in the hospital, we verify which tooth is in question each visit.  That's for our patients protection.  We look forward to completing your treatment and will make a note to ensure we are thorough and detailed with you in the future.

name: Black and Brilliant
text: This was by far the most pleasant experience I had at a dentist. I had to have a root canal and was so scared. Let me first say his staff is always so pleasant, and his office is so welcoming and relaxing. I mean come on, paraffin wax, aromatherapy, Netflix while you are serviced, it feels more like a vacation then a trip to the dentist. Well anyway, He numbed my mouth before giving me the shot, I didn’t even feel it! The root canal was quick, painless, and I got my crown within minutes, I didn’t have to come back! They called me back on time and I was out in a couple of hours. I am NEVER leaving Dr. Barnett and his crew!

resp.text: We are so glad we were able to give you a fabulous vacation Jasmine!   See you soon!!!

name: Jeffery Engbrecht
text: I had a great cleaning at Divine Expressions!

resp.text: Awesome Jeffery.  Please tell all your family and friends about it.

text: I've never been one that likes, dentist or doctor's. But the people at this place are great going in and coming out. They greet you by name.I love them

resp.text: We love you too Beverly!

text: I've never gone to a dentist that was so welcoming and professional. Very thorough and the patient care is awesome.!

resp.text: Thank you Cecilia

text: I love this place. Nice comfortable atmosphere and they even give you blankets and hand exfoliations. You are so comfortable you wouldn't want to leave.

resp.text: Awesome.  We are so glad we were able to make your visit with us relaxing.

name: Marc Loertscher
text: At my first and last appointment with Doctor B. I very directly asked what work was needed and he wouldn't answer. When I got to the front desk they out lined over six thousand dollars of dental work that my new dentist said wasn't even remotely necessary. I felt like he viewed me as an atm machine not a patient. To his credit he offered to sit down with me when I told him we would be leaving but it was too little too late.

resp.text: We are sorry you feel your treatment plan was not accurate.  It is customary for me to go over treatment plans as long as needed so I'm not sure where the miscommunication was for you. However every dentist diagnosis differently and I am unaware of any prices while diagnosisng. We keep what's needed clinically separate from finances because we feel finances should not dictate treatment on your end or ours. Our hygienist and I both codiagnosis patients to ensure we are all on the same page. We use technology and Intraoral pictures to show you what's going on in your mouth. Because we want to be transparent anytime someone is confused or in doubt we offer the option to come in to get clarity. Trust is vital in any relationship. And we are happy you have found someone you can pick all your trust in what they say you need. Thanks for sharing your concerns as we view all feedback as vital.

name: Mrs. Irby
text:
Ms Janine was awesome! When I arrived, I was greeted by another employee and Ashley. Ashley had been very helpful in scheduling my appointment via phone. I filled out my paperwork and within minutes Janine took me back for a quick tour. The facility is BEAUTIFUL! I appreciated all of the amenities that were offered. Janine explained all of the equipment, showed me pictures and kept me informed of the process all the way through. My cleaning did not take long, but my overall appointment was a bit lengthy. Give yourself extra time for your first visit. Dr. Barnett seemed friendly, but we didn't talk long because Janine was so thorough! I appreciated the treatment plan provided and look forward to getting to a brighter smile.

Updated 8.1.18 My husband found Divine Expressions and we haven't been disappointed. The staff is friendly and courteous and can pretty much handle it all. Dr. Barnett is usually in-and-out so I appreciate that the hygienists and receptionists are so kind. The treatment plan you receive is clear and outlines the plan for your teeth-you don't waste time wondering what's next or the cost. The facility is beautiful and up-to-date. Everything is always clean and there are little perks like hand wax, chap-stick and warm towels. The wait usually isn't extensive. The only downside is that the facility isn't open on Fridays (the day I'm off early!). Otherwise I have been pleased!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Irby. We look forward to taking good care of all your dental needs.

name: Briannah Weaver
text: Ms. Rita is wonderful! She takes her time and makes sure you have everything you need. She’s the best!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Teresa Brown
text: All personnel were professional and personable. I did have to wait about 45 minutes due to an emergency patient they were servicing. However,  not a big deal because the service I recieved far exceeded the wait. Janine is the best!

resp.text: Thank you for putting your trust in us and being flexible with your appointment time. We work hard to not make our patients wait but when an emergency presents we try to reduce patients pain and save their lives!  We look forward to a life long relationship with you and helping you achieve all your dental dreams!

text: By far the worst work I have ever had done I have never had any teeth issues until visiting with him when he instructed that I needed not one bit 3 root canals that I did get done by him in which they have ALL FALLEN OUT I am extremely pissed I feel he does not know what he is doing in that aspect I have not had these any longer than 1 year MAYBE 2 ! I will defintely be seeking legal ways to get my money back for the lack of quality service done on my mouth it is completely ridiculous I wouldn't recommend visiting unless it is for MINOR issues and I do stress MINOR!

resp.text: I'm sorry Mr. Clark your name was not found in our pool of patients.  There are many steps to root canals to ensure their longevity.   Please contact the doctor that completed them and I'm sure they will guide you through what's needed to complete your work.  If you go by another name we stand behind our work and will be happy to take a look at your current condition. Please be reminded that we recommend regular cleanings to support your teeth and ensure you keep them for life. Our number should you need us is(256) 837-1200.

name: Thomas Robertson
text: First and Foremost this is not a dentist office! This is a Five-Star Luxury Spa & Resort for your Smile! Divine Expressions luxurious packages include TVs on the ceiling for your viewing pleasure during routine visits, warm lavender scented towels to wash up with after your appointment, and the most knowledgeable and professional staff in North Alabama that equips you with the information and services to ensure the wellbeing of your oral health. Dr. Barnett and his staff has done an amazing job maintaining a clean & sanitized environment for their patients, providing exceptional services with state-of-the-art equipment and gadgets that make your appointments a breeze! I highly recommend Latoya Baker! She was kind, gentle yet thorough, knowledgeable, and she laughed at all my jokes (had no impact on this review lol). Dr. Barnett has done an amazing job with establishing a family culture within his practice and with staff as you will witness when you come here. His staff has nothing but great things to say about Dr. Barnett and once you meet him you will see why. I highly recommend Divine Expressions to anyone who demands nothing but the best for their teeth. Our whole family now goes there and our three year old absolutely loves the dentist now and her experience has been nothing but great! Thank you Dr. Barnett and staff for all that you do!!!

text: I went to Cumberland back in 2015 to get fillings and a root canal done. Long story short, I have paid three times to get the same filling re-done and now my crown has came out which will result in me paying more money at another dentist office. I agree with others, they seem very rushed at everything they do, but I can’t afford for them to keep messing up costing me money. Never again will I go back, good luck to those who do and kudos to those who have had a better experience.

I do not recommend this place to anyone. When I went back due to so much pain I found out he put the filling in too deep and hit a nerve now I have to get the tooth pulled or a root canal... SMH.. The worst place

name: Melissa Simmons
text: I went in last Saturday to get 4 wisdom tooth removed when I got back in the room for them to proceed to do the procedure I feel it was a rush job and they was just ready to go home dr. Kelly had no bedside manners in my opinion she was just ready to clock out to me I feel as if she was trying to talk me out of it after I paid cash money with no insurance to get it done after about four to five days at home I noticed the back of my teeth had a funny taste with something coming out of them I put a napkin in my mouth to find that it was yellow stuff coming out of it I immediately called the office on a Saturday during business hours no one ever picked up the phone after I got off work I proceeded to call back that night in the answering service picked up and I told her that someone needed to get in contact with me because it was an emergency and what the situation was this was Sunday it is now 4:10 p.m. Monday and no one has still contacted me I went to the emergency room on Sunday night and they told me the antibiotic that I got with the procedure that I had I should not have that antibiotic they put me on more antibiotics of which I had to pay for my ER visit but long story short I wouldn't recommend taking a dog to this place with no one contact you about an emergency that is a red flag!!!!!

I have been to a lot of dentists in my lifetime and they are at the top of my list !!!

I highly recommend them !

name: Wendal Burks
text: I enjoy talking with Mrs Ryan just in the two visits I had at the office it seems as if we have known each other longer. She is very good dental hygienist. I trust that they know what is best for my dental needs

text: Our family has been long term patients of Dr. Dillard and we can't say enough good things about the entire staff!  They're always up to date on new techniques and are very careful to make your visit as pain free as possible.  We wouldn't go anywhere else and we highly recommend Dr. Dillard!

Lisa Tucker is the most amazing person in the world! I could not imagine going to a dentist that did not employ someone like Lisa.

Also, everyone there is amazing too. They make you feel like you're at home which is hard to do at a dentist's office. I have recommended them multiple times and will continue to do so.

text: Great experience! More than patient and gentle with my sensitive teeth, always kind and trying to make sure i’m comfortable.

text:
From start to finish this dental office was top notch!  The front staff had smiles on their faces when you walk in.  Then your hygienist comes out to greet you, mine being Shelley. Then of course on to the next part of the dentist, WHICH I HATE” Shelley made very pleasant!

He brought his wife to be his dental assistant and he repaired my tooth in order for me not to miss work the next morning!  What else can I say about this awesome doctor and his amazing staff!?! The recommended Advil.
Awesome.
I will not be back. I will find another dentist.

They have coordinated with my dentist who is doing the denture fitting, which is a relief!
I will be returning for the procedure soon and feel very confident about the care I’ll be given!
I appreciate the referral that this practice!

text:
Kathy Eady - author

Megan was a natural on her first day! I had to get all four wisdom teeth extracted and they did an outstanding job EVERY step of the way. I have a fear of the needle puncturing my skin and they handled me with precision and accuracy, plus they numbed my injection site before giving the IV. My procedure only took 30 minutes and then I was rolled out to my driver/ best friends. It honestly could not have gone any better and I'm just extremely grateful for everyone that had a hand in this. Thank you all for being so amazing!!! I know that sometimes always doing your best and what's right may seem like no one cares, but for the people like me that pay attention, you all matter and are so important. Thank you truly for everything between the conversations to the gentle care given. It matters and the love for what you do shows for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Ali.

name: Anna Faye
text: I just went to the office in Prattville for a consultation about wisdom teeth surgery. The staff and doctor were extremely nice and thorough. I have been told I will be having my surgery in the hospital due to my medical conditions. That made me know that the doctor prioritizes my safety. Hopefully my surgery goes well! I definitely recommend this place.

name: Aliah Brown
text: I absolutely love me some Dr. Parker &'d his staff...😊 I had wisdom teeth pulled today &'d I feel great...no pain at all! They are so caring!! I even called after my surgery to thank him!!

name: Tracy Nicole Fisher
text: I had 8 teeth pulled. Dr. Parker and his staff were great! Very kind, very efficient. I would recommend this office to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you very much.

name: Freya Renee
text:
The staff was amazing, very polite. However, for whatever reason they did not run my insurance before I went back and I ended up paying out of pocket just to be told I cannot use my insurance until January.
I would have cancelled the appointment had I known. I would have never agreed to pay almost $70 for a 5 minute chit chat.
I just found it a bit odd that they kept my insurance card and id until the end of my appointment and then hit me with the “self pay” after everything was over.
Don’t self pay patients pay before hand?
It just sits wrong with me.

name: Laurice Goorley
text: Professional staff. Incredible service. Highly recommend this surgical team.

name: Sapphire Washington
text: It's always a pleasure dealing with the staff here. They are very detailed, attentive and provide quick service. I had a tooth extracted in the past and had no complications after whatsoever.

name: Amy Kearley
text: Awesome experience!! This team made wisdom teeth extraction a breeze! Everyone is super warm and friendly...professional and timely! Highly recommend!

name: Reagan Smith
text: Got all 4 of my wisdom teeth removed by Dr. Johnson, he was a nice man and his nurses were nice and comforting. It was as smooth of a surgery you can ask for.

resp.text: Thanks Reagan.

name: Aimee Ordung
text: Absolutely amazing! In and out, didn’t even know I was under, lol. Highly recommend! And will def use again

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and we are glad that your visit was successful.

name: Manisha Patel
text: I’d read a review that referred to O & M as a “well-oiled machine,” and in my experience, that is an accurate description.  Every staff member I came into contact with during consultation visit and actual procedure was competent, efficient, and left no time for me (someone who was already nervous) to feel any anxiety.  Dr. Johnson was calm and confident which made me feel the same way.  The facility is clean, I appreciated the Covid-protocols and overall I would rate the experience a 10/10.

name: janice hancock
text: We were met by a friendly nurse to do the Covid check-in and made to feel comfortable and secure about our safety by procedures in place. The admin was efficient and kind- very professional.  The nurses in the surgery room were professional, efficient, and kind and took great care of me.  Dr. Johnson was friendly and his consistent demeanor of confidence and calm always provide a great surgical environment. I am happy and satisfied with the entire experience!  Thanks again for the great care!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and we are glad that your surgery went great.

name: Terri E Bischoff
text:
Clean, well lit and wonderful staff. I was treated respectfully and reassured that the bump I had on my gums was treatable. I went in nervous and embarrassed, I came out reassured and comfortable.

I'd give them more ⭐'s if I could.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.

name: Freedom Reigns
text: The first thing I noticed about the office staff was how efficiently they operated, like a well oiled machine. The second thing I noticed was how clean Dr Parker’s room was, even the corners of the floor were spotless! Cleanliness in a physician’s office speaks volumes to me. Dr Parker was thorough and didn’t rush through my appointment. And his assistant, Neika, was friendly and made sure we understood everything the following appointment would entail. It was a good experience.

name: Family J
text: Consultation was fast but we already new they needed to come out..Scheduling the surgery was easy to schedule when we wanted it..The desk ladies were all nice and easy to talk to. Surgery day was a easy check-in and Covid safe. They let us know everything we needed to know before the patient came out so we could leave as soon as they were done. Which was nice..When they woke up they let us know that all the nurses were so nice and played great music they liked and talked about things they liked which they said made them feel more comfortable. We had every med we would need to make healing go easy and painless. Healing took about a week to fully feel normal again. If we have to go thru this surgery again, we would definitely use them again and recommend them

name: Haley Plato
text: Dr. Parker and his staff were very nice during the process. He made sure I understood everything that was going to happen during my surgery . If you are looking for an Oral Surgeon. I highly recommend Dr. J.J. Parker. He is the best !

name: Jessica Lee
text: Dr Parker is the best! The entire staff is amazing!!!

name: Andy Layne
text: I had a tooth on the upper left extracted. I told the nurse I have a good vein in my Left AC, she found it quickly and before I knew it I was walking up post procedure.  I had an adverse reaction to Lortab after getting my wisdom teeth out many years ago.  The other nurse asked me about other meds. I've never had any other procedures so no need for pain meds, so I said I had not had them.  I was sent home with 800 mg Ibuprofen which is like popping tic tacs. OTC Ibupropren has never worked for my dental pain and this is just as useless.  Other than the pain meds which don't really help at all everything else was great.  The woman who came out to ask the questions, the ladies at the front desk,  the ladies over billing, the nurses, and doctor were all super nice. It's barely noticeable I have a tooth missing.

name: Hope Langley
text: Dr. Kean is a great Oral Surgeon. He has such a kind and professional mannerism. He takes time to explain the procedure and is very attentive to his patients. I highly recommend him, as he has been the one I have trusted to take care of my family.

name: Priscilla Beasley
text: The staff was very accommodating, friendly and professional. Dr. Johnson was extremely thorough during our consultation. I would highly recommend their service.

name: dorthy powell
text: I would recommend this service to anyone needing it. The office visit was very pleasant and the Doctor and nursing  staff making you feel at ease through the entire process. My surgery was this morning and it's been 8 hours and no pain or problems.

name: Brittany Mcconico
text:
Just amazing I knew everything was going to be fine especially with the faith I have!
Very quick and friendly ❤️

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Brittany.

name: Kaylee Garner
text: I was nervous and scared, but everyone there was nice and helped to calm me down and get my mind off things I have had slight to no pain after wisdom teeth extraction.

name: Angela Upshaw
text: Went here several years ago for a bulge on my son’s gum. Dr Parker advised us he had extra teeth which caused the bulge. Dr Parker seemed like a nice enough doctor, even called to check up after my son’s procedure.  Years later, not only was the bulge still there, but we found out my son did not have extra teeth and Dr Parker had pulled his permanent teeth. It wasn’t until we went to another oral surgeon that we found out the real problem. Now my son is missing 2 teeth that’s cost us and will continue cost us until he’s old enough to get implants. Yes, we went back and was brushed off by Dr. Parker.

name: Rex McClellan
text: They are wonderful, the entire experience, when you aren't very comfortable with dental work, was excellent! Dr.Parker was wonderful even calling me the next day to check on me to see how I was doing!

name: Lady Gamer
text: I went in for a consolt and they did x rays even though my dr already did them they charged me 70 dollars for that when it wasn't needed since my dentist referred me and all they needed was to request the xrays from my dentist. Then wanted to charge me over 500 after insurance for a wisdom tooth extraction that wasn't near the nerve or impacted. They also refused local anesthesia and wanted to sedate me even though I expressed I do NOT want to be sedated due to having previously having brain surgery and I am too scared to be sedated. He told me that is the ONLY option. Also he said while I was sedated they would have to crank my jaw open since I could only open it 2 fingers width wide since brain surgery. He told me he doesn't know why I cant open it wide and told me go see an oral surgeon at the uab hospital. My appointment was the day I got back from driving for 13 hours due to family emergency and I was told I would only have to pay a cancelation fee if I scheduled another appointment. Well they lied and reported it to credit and added on a 90 dollar cancelation fee when I called and canceled and had no intentions on rescheduling with a dentist who charges so much and refuses to do local anesthesia. Worst experience I have ever had with an oral surgeon! Not friendly not understanding not willing to follow patients wishes! I went to a different oral surgeon and paid less than 200 for the extraction no cranking my jaw open and local anesthesia only! Do not go here!

name: v.m. arrington
text: Dr. Parker, Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery Associate and staff was amazing!

name: Cheryl Calhoun
text: From the moment I entered the office I felt welcomed.  Such friendly and loving staff. Dr. Johnson explained the procedure and that really put my mind at ease. Thanks

name: Deroithy “Cool Breeze” Scott
text: Awesome Doctor and great staff.

name: Von Foster
text: Visited OMS today. My experience was great. Doctor and staff were wonderful.

name: Ansley Russell
text: Dr. Kean is phenomenal!! I highly recommend him! He cares about his patients and he definitely knows what he is doing! Also all other staff are very nice as well!!

name: Hannah S
text: The patient experience was clearly not a priority at this organization. My consultation with Dr. Parker lasted maybe one minute, leaving me more nervous than I previously was to get my wisdom teeth removed. This was my first time ever being put under for a procedure, so the lack of connection and trust I felt with the doctor did not sit well with me. My other complaint is in regards to how I was treated on procedure day. First, my wait time was astronomical: probably 3-4 hours, which is a horrendous wait prior to a fasted procedure. When I was woken up post-procedure, I was basically yanked out of my chair as soon as I could open my eyes. Due to the meds, I couldn’t walk at all and was dragged to my car by two nurses on either side of me, catching me as I fell. It would have been nice to have been given 5-10 minutes to wake up and regain consciousness before being forced to walk. It made me feel like this place prioritizes being a wisdom tooth factory rather than caring for their patients. I am giving two stars because medically speaking I had no complications and had a nice recovery.

name: Beanie Turner
text: Very caring and simply wonderful group that Dr Parker has working with him! I was told by the nurse if I had any problems after surgery to call or message anytime! We had problems and my son was in a lot of pain so I messaged the nurse on a Wednesday night and she was caring and sympathetic and called me as soon as she got to work to get us in that day when they were already swamped! When we got there Dr Parker removes a sharp piece of bone that had embedded in his gum, my son had immediate relief and saved us from having another surgery. Dr Parker even called the day after surgery himself to check on my son which is unheard of these days. Until you see your child suffering in pain and can’t eat or drink or sleep you wish you could be the one enduring that pain and you become desperate to get them help and this group cared about him just like I do!

name: Monquinta Harris
text:
The place was nice and clean. Temperature was taken at the door and given hand sanitizer. Wait time was 30 minutes. I like how fast I was given an appt for my surgery. My consultation was on a Tuesday and surgery on Thursday.
Update: I had my surgery Thursday to remove 3 wisdom teeth and Dr Parker is amazing as well as his staff. It was well worth the money going to an oral surgeon and not your regular dentist. My regular dentist remove one wisdom tooth and it was torture. My face was swollen for 2 weeks. With dr Parker, I have minimal swelling and not in pain due to taking my pain meds.

name: Mohammad Alam
text: From check in to check out, one word EXCEPTIONAL! Thank you Dr Johnson and the entire team! Highly recommend!

name: Zatie
text: I came to this office when it was off Vaughn road a while back to get my wisdom teeth removed and it was impeccable service! I came here today at the new beautiful location off halcyon to get a tooth extraction and I must say the the service and the actually surgery was impeccable once again! The staff and is so nice and sweet and definitely recommend this business for your oral and Maxillofacial needs!

name: Maliha Islam
text: I had my wisdom teeth removed from here last year. I didn't like this place because the consultation was just me watching a video (which I can kind of understand. There's no need to have a person explain the process). After that, the dentist came in, gave me the TINIEST grin, then proceeded to talk at 2x speed for a total of 15 seconds before leaving the room. He came off very cold and rude. I've never been scared of any dentist even as a kid until that moment. The only good thing I can say is that the procedure was quick, and I recovered quickly without having to use any of the prescribed opioids, so that's why I'm giving 3 stars.

name: Alicia Parzynski
text: I was soo scared to have surgery mainly because ive never had it. But it was actually really good and i had the best sleep ever.

name: Cathy Desselle
text: I LOVE this office, very on top of things with the virus situation very clean nice classy office very nice polite amazing surgeon

name: Alicia Parzynski
text: I was soo scared to have surgery mainly because ive never had it. But it was actually really good and i had the best sleep ever.

name: Mia James

name: Makhari Waller-McCary
text: Super friendly staff. My first visit was today and it went very well.

name: katerra hampleton
text: Got my wisdom teeth out and I was in and out in like 30 minutes if that !!!! Fast, clean, and super friendly! I have no pain either. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

name: Stephanie Bone
text: Very professional and friendly. Quick procedure (all wisdom teeth removed at once) very little pain the next day. They are very clean. If I ever need another procedure done I will be coming back. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.

name: Keyarrow Moore
text: I was referred here but I felt very rushed and didn't feel like the procedure was explained fully. I felt like I wasn't given many options at all from payment to scheduling. Kind of disappointed because I've had to wait two weeks for a procedure and then deal with attitude.

name: Denise Jarrett Norcross
text: My daughter needed her wisdom teeth removed - our dentist recommended Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery Associates. We saw Dr. Parker at the Prattville office and have been very pleased. We will return there for sure as the need arises! Office staff very nice & professional. Everything explained in precise detail.

name: Sonya Floyd
text: Dr. Johnson and his team were great. Very professional and efficient.

name: BriannaIman TV
text: Not the best experience and bad customer service. I went for a wisdom teeth consultation. After my X-Rays, they placed me in a room to watch a video and wait for the doctor. After the 9 minute video I literally was left waiting in the room for over an hour and when Dr.Parker finally comes in all he does is take a mirror and looks at my wisdom teeth and the appointment is over. After the very short meeting we are then led to the payment station where we were met with a very sassy rude worker. When scheduling an appointment here you might want to bring a fully charged phone and some snacks because your going to be waiting for a while.

name: BS Outdoors
text: 11/10 recommend these people. Very friendly staff and very quick and easy operation. I don’t remember, nor did I feel a thing. The recovery has been painless so far as well! To say the least, if I need any addition oral surgery, I will definitely be coming here.

name: Anthony Waters
text: They waited to the day of my appointment that I scheduled weeks in advance to notify me that my wisdom teeth consultation is being rescheduled to a month and half later. I took off that day which was hard to do for that day. I feel like they pick and choose who they wanted to reschedule. Not to pull the race card but why me and I asked how did they come to the conclusion of who to reschedule and no one could give me a answer. They are unprofessional and some racist people there and they don't care about what you need done but only what is convienence for them. I wish I could give no stars

name: Marleshia Safford
text: I had my bottom teeth pulled out first 2months ago and got my top two wisdom teeth out today! I didn’t feel nothing at all !! Dr Johnson is the best! I would recommend him to anybody!! Yess!

name: The History Buff
text: Dr. Johnson and his staff were first class toward me from start to finish. If I ever needed another tooth pulled, he's the guy I'd go to.

name: Carl Bledsoe
text: These folks are very caring and work together as a great team. Everthing about this experience was great!

name: Sandra Barner
text: Staff was very friendly, the doctor was very thorough with the details involving the X-rays and the surgery.

name: Daborah Evans
text: It was a really good experience. I was terrified but they made me feel really comfortable and it was over so quickly. Everyone was really nice. Would definitely refer them to anyone I know.

name: Angie Hicks
text:
Dr. Kean is the most caring and kindhearted oral surgeon I've ever met
He truly cares about his patients. What he's doing for me is truly amazing.  Thank you Dr. Kean and your amazing staff.

name: Angie Hicks
text:
Dr. Kean is the most caring and kindhearted oral surgeon I've ever met
He truly cares about his patients. What he's doing for me is truly amazing.  Thank you Dr. Kean and your amazing staff.

name: Carol Roberts
text: This is an excellent surgical center. They were quick and efficient. The lady at the desk and the nurse weren't particularly friendly but they were polite and got the job done. There was no confusion over the procedure, payment or after care. The doctor was wonderful. The entire procedure (wisdom teeth) was over in 15 minutes.

name: Sandra Godwin
text: Very professional group and doctor.

name: Brittnie Whitt
text:
I was referred by another dentist (due to COVID 19, all other dentists are apparently closed) and was put through to Dr Parkers office. My mother has had a horrible tooth infection and was set for extraction via her regular dentist but with the pandemic her appointment has been rescheduled over and over. She has been to the emergency room twice for antibiotics because the infection is so bad she cant move her jaw or get out of bed. Not only did the office representative hang up on me after giving me the most pathetic excuse for proffesionalism she insisted that the only option was to pay 900 dollars or risk the infection getting worse. I asked if there was anything else she could inform me to do and she literally got so frustrated she hung up in my face. What I know is how you treat people in the most need especially during a time like this says more about your moral compass and character than anything else will.
Just my advice but go somewhere else or you run the risk of being swept under the rug as a deplorable.

name: GIG Terry J Sayles Sr.
text: I had the most wonderful experience and this was my consultation appointment. The entire staff showed total professionalism as well as provided a very welcoming atmosphere! I'm truly looking forward to my next visit. From the bottom to the top of my heart I already love you guys. Please don't ever change unless it's getting better at what you're already great at. 100% SATISFACTION IS HOW I FEEL!!!

name: ReNina Fields
text: The staff was very nice and pleasant. The atmosphere was very inviting. I didn't have to wait a long time to be taken care of: from check in to getting my copayment done to going back for surgery, all went by swiftly. And my procedure was a success. I would recommend them to anyone to take care of their oral surgery needs.

name: Tonya Catrett
text: Staff was extremely helpful and friendly.  They took good care of the girls.

name: Angela Caldwell
text: Today was my first time at this location with my son, the staff was awesome..

name: R P
text: An evaluation here led me to a treatment plan costing 15k. The exact same treatment plan from UAB? 4k. That's all some of you need to know. I'm sure they do great work here but that's not always the deciding factor.

name: Allen Sanford
text: I have used Dr. Kean and his wonderful staff since a major traumatic injury in 1996. I myself a medical  professional  have never experienced a more professional office ,staff,nurses and physicians.In a day of new medicine it is rare to find a group of people with such a personal touch.They listen,explain and make themselves available 24/7.They have taken the same care with my family members as well as those I refer.Montgomery medicine could take a lesson from this group.I could go on for days about good reviews but as we say in the south,"nuff said".

name: R P
text: An evaluation here led me to a treatment plan costing 15k. The exact same treatment plan from UAB? 4k. That's all some of you need to know. I'm sure they do great work here but that's not always the deciding factor.

name: Gloria Black
text: Quick appointment, knowledgeable staff regarding insurance filings, coverage, etc. Saw Dr. Johnson and after a thorough exam, I was relieved to be told there was nothing to worry about. I would recommend this doctor and facility to anyone.

name: Shelly Marie
text: Friendly staff and clean facility. Would benefit from more extensive after care instruction, such as what to expect and when to worry. When I called several days after surgery, due to a concern with my wound site, I did not feel that my concerns were addressed properly. I ended up going to see my regular dentist that same day to evaluate and treat my wound site in which my gums were extremely inflamed around my surgical site/stitches causing quite a bit of discomfort. I felt rushed through the day of my procedure. I will be seeking care elsewhere for my dental implant procedure due to the feeling of being just a number with this group.

name: Allen Sanford
text: I have used Dr. Kean and his wonderful staff since a major traumatic injury in 1996. I myself a medical  professional  have never experienced a more professional office ,staff,nurses and physicians.In a day of new medicine it is rare to find a group of people with such a personal touch.They listen,explain and make themselves available 24/7.They have taken the same care with my family members as well as those I refer.Montgomery medicine could take a lesson from this group.I could go on for days about good reviews but as we say in the south,"nuff said".

name: Margaret Eagerton
text: The BEST staff in every way.. Highly recommend this office!!

name: Brandy Frazier
text: Very friendly and understanding staff. Looking forward my next visit.

name: Dennis Unger
text: Very clear with the information and billing.  Very little pain after having Wisdom Teeth removed, back at work the next day. The Staff is fantastic!

name: Asemeri Moody
text: I can’t remember much but they’re very friendly and made me feel very comfortable

name: No Name
text: The nurses didn’t make my daughter feel comfortable. My daughter was panicking and the nurses were laughing and I didn’t appreciate it. Also the staff needs to communicate properly with the patient and family about the  procedure.

name: Melanie Bentley
text: Very friendly and professional staff. I was seen on time for me appointment and all my questions and concerns were addressed.  I highly recommend  Dr. Kean and his staff.

name: Jeff Traver
text: Great customer service! They truly care about their patients.

name: Julie Coker
text: I just want to say that the entire staff and Dr. Parker are wonderful. I had a tooth pulled today and it was very pleasant experience. I will continue to go to Dr. Parker for any future Dental needs. Thank you!

name: V T
text: Dr M. Johnson and staff are wonderful!   They got me in and out so quickly!  I will highly recommend this place.

name: R&J seejohn
text:
Staff is super friendly however the word appointment is taken VERY LOOSELY. count on a minimum of 2 hours even if you see your dr for 5 min.

Additionally if you are not a fan of christian music you better bring earphones.  It was too loud and too sectarian for a business in my opinion.

name: Ciana Coppage
text: Dr Parker is Friendly and informative☺

name: Michael Simmons
text: I've been a patient here for a couple procedures (Prattville location), great people, very professional, love Dr Johnson. I'm currently scheduling another implant, he did a great job on my last one.

name: Kierra Phillips
text: The staff is always so nice and the environment is always clean and comfortable. I definitely recommend them as a practice.

name: J Williams
text: Horrible customer service ruins the experience. The front desk people are flat out rude. The receptionist never even acknowledged me. I signed in and sat down. She appeared to be asleep. I finally had to get up a few minutes later & ask about check in procedures. Dentist & his aides were professional & courteous though. I'm thinking of getting rid of the dentist who referred me to OMA just because those women were so rude.

name: Hannah Oliver
text: I got a qustion can someody anwser my qustion im looking for a dentist or a oral surgon that will put me to sleep and do it in a hospital and in a hospital bed im spina bifdia and i was wanting to know is this one a hospital  that will put me to sleep and do it in a hospital bed thanks

name: kelli gilliam
text: Dr Johnson and his staff provided outstanding care when my son had his wisdom teeth removed. They provided specific instructions for the days following surgery (which we followed completely) and he did not have any problems.

name: Douglas Clapp

It felt like they were taking advantage of the insurance company and charging for services that were not warranted or needed!  When it was brought to their attention and questioned I felt it was not handled professionally.

name: latisha edwards
text: Nice friendly professional environment. Their new office is as cozy as the old one was. Love the work of Dr. Parker and his team!!

name: trent garnett
text: Dr. Johnson and staff were great! Had 4 wisdom teeth removed and only took 20 minutes.

name: Mommy's On A Budget
text: Scheduled a visit to get consult on getting wisdom teeth pulled. They were very friendly and informative.

name: John Carter
text: I had a wisdom tooth pulled today, and Ive been skeptical about dentists due to some bad experiences. I must say...This place is amazing. Everyone there was cordial and friendly. Once I woke up from the procedure I was told it took all of 5mins, and I didnt even realized I had fallen asleep. The Staff and Dentist here are AMAZING.

name: Chastity Brumit

text: I recently had oral surgery done by Dr.  Johnson and I have healed beautifully .  I never knew what was going on until it was time for me to go.   Thanks.

name: Venisha Williams
text: Very friendly staff, not a very long wait time with in and out very quick service, great experience.

name: Mary Yates
text: I recently moved from another state with an incompleted dental implant.  I called and was able to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ingalls for the following week.  My previous provider said they would send my records, but did not.  Dr. Ingalls and his staff went above and beyond my expectations making phone calls, working with the previous provider,  ordering the parts, and working with my new dentist to help me.  And after doing all that they only charged me for the cost of the parts.  I've never met a more friendly, helpful, and caring staff.  They are top notch in my opinion, and I highly recommend them.

Very friendly and professional .
Dr Johnson performed oral surgery on me yesterday.  I could not ask for a better experience . I would recommend them to all my friends.

name: The Marching GreenMachine
text: Slow Service

name: Tasha Morris
text: Great experience!

name: shannon Bell
text: Friendly and professional. Even saw me when the dates of my appointment got mixed up. I would highly refer my friends and my family to these Doctors. In all my years receiving oral surgery I have never felt this comfortable with an office like this one.

name: Chasity Cochran

text: First time back to the dentist in a while! Deffinately the best first experience I’ve ever had! I came in and the ladies at the front were very nice, they also send you a paper in the mail that you fill out before hand so you don’t have to wait and fill it out in the waiting room! They had coffee and water in the waiting room, not that I was there long enough! About 5 minutes passed and they took me back! I got and exam and the Dental Hygienist I had was so sweet! I was supposed to go in for just the first exam but she happened to have time to clean my teeth as well! She did a great job, my mouth hasn’t felt this clean in years!! The doctor also came and talked to me, even though I didn’t see him this particular time, which made me feel very comfortable, and talked about what my perfect smile would be and how we could achieve that! Overall great experience, in and out in 45 min, and it didnt cost me an arm and a leg! Would recommend 100%!

name: Brett Morrison
text: My wife and I were looking to take our little guy Charlie to the dentist for the first time at a little over 2.5 years old, and were a little nervous as to how his first visit would go.  I have not had a dentist in Tuscaloosa/Northport since I moved down here over 10 years ago, so I asked for recommendations on Facebook.  Dr.'s Taylor, Hydrick and Gentry at the Smile Design Center kept popping up as recommendations so we decided to call and get an appointment.  The office environment is excellent, and the staff was outstanding and super friendly.  Our hygienist was Kelsey (I hope I spelled her name correctly), and she was amazing with Charlie, and he seemed to really enjoy the experience.  I had not been to the dentist in a while so I had my appointment right after his, and can confirm, that Kelsey and Dr. Taylor are wonderfully gifted at what they do! I had a deep cleaning because it had been a while and it truthfully was not a bad experience at all.  I would highly recommend the Smile Design Center to anyone looking for a great dentist and dentist experience in the Tuscaloosa/Northport area!

name: minnie killen
text:
I went to this dentist close when they first opened up.
They really really damaged my mouth.
They said they did 3 fillings but really did four... Not only that but they drilled to far and unfortunately i had to have all of them pulled. I had 3 surgeries trying to correct their mistake before we just had them pulled. i did try to reach out to them but when i called expressing something was wrong the lady in the front wouldnt listen and instead said they would look at it but in a month and said we needed to try and get the others. I had to then switch dentists and since then im terrified to even attempt to get something as small as a filling.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. Very sorry your experience wasn’t what you’d hoped. Our team will look into this.

name: Starr Lehner
text:
While I was saying wrong tooth she kept pulling stating she'll get it. I asked why won't it come out. She stated she'll get it.
So she pulled the good tooth and left decayed abcessed tooth beside it.
Wouldn't let me see tooth she pulled.
Had to go to another dentist who very easily pulled decayed tooth. He asked why she pulled wrong tooth.
When partial I've had more than 30 yrs wouldn't fit back I stated maybe because when you pulled tooth the others moved. Oh no that didn't happen. So she grinded on my partial making it for first time ever loose.
Well went back to get partial and they added a metal loop and wrapped it around another decayed tooth. Recently found out (from Dr)acid reflux quickly ruined my teeth. Always was complimented on my teeth and the care I took. So of course it broke off completely.
Of course Signature Smile wants their co-pay money. I sent what I could. Still I suffer. No apology.
Since the ordeal I've dealt with parotid gland pain.
I'm sure because I'm poor and on Medicare (cancer) I just don't meet their standard of a wealthy christian person so it doesn't matter. Wish I could post pictures of my mouth and what I live with because of them.

resp.text:
Starr,

We have tried contacting you directly regarding your review. Our records regarding the visits you mentioned are from 2017 and 2018, and we have documented consents for the treatment you requested. You also have recurring visits for comprehensive care after the treatment was completed, with no complaints or regard for any issues you mentioned in your review. We are happy to discuss this with you further. Our main priority is to give patients high quality care for their dental health and needs. We hope to hear from you soon!

Signature Smile

name: Chris K. Northington
text: I can not say enough good things about Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smile.  They are without a doubt the best Dental practice I have ever been to.  We turned to them to fix my wife's implants/crowns when no-one else in the area could make them look right.  From the moment we walked in the door, we were greeting with compassion and understanding, and assured that they could fix her crowns.  They immediately scheduled an appoint for that same week to do her evaluation.  In that first appointment, Dr. Wilson laid out exactly what needed to be done, gave us a time frame for the work to be completed with cost estimates, and hand made her a set of temporaries that looked better than any of the final crowns from the other dentists we had worked with.  He performed laser dentistry on her gums to give her a bigger smile, used the KOR whitening system to give her a bright white color to her teeth, and put on two new crowns that he gets from a lab in Hollywood, CA.  I can proudly say today that my wife has a beautiful smile that she is so proud of thanks to the work of Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smiles.  They are now offering laser filings that can be done with no numbing or drilling.  If you are a new patient, they offer a free Smile Evaluation that includes a panoramic X-ray.  I have referred many customers to them because of my belief in the work they do.

From cleaning to root canal services, I have had comfortable, painless, and easy sessions with Dr. Wilson and the staff.  He utilizes the latest technology including laser, easy and non invasive X-Ray sessions, and new ways of imagery when viewing bone structure.  I want to also send accolades to the front reception area as well.  The associates are so very friendly and helpful.  They were a great help with my insurance questions and very helpful on every thing I needed as far as administrative information.  I have never had to wait too long for my appointments and felt like I was always visiting family.

name: Mary Robinson
text:
I recently won a Sheer Whitening Gift Certificate at Blue valued at $149. I scheduled my appointment with the dental rep and asked what I could expect. She told me to plan to be there about an hour. They would clean, polish and then give me the Sheer Whitening treatments. Wow, I thought, pretty good prize. I proceeded to ask what kind of whitening treatments they used, 5 day strips, ugh, I thought, oh well.

Unfortunately, I arrived for my appointment about 10 minutes late, however, not intentional. The receptionist was a bit unfriendly and I thought maybe it was because I was late. Shortly, a dental assistant came to me with a clip board and 5 pages to fill out. I completed my basic information and soon realized they were wanting more info than was totally necessary to claim a prize. I began scanning over the pages and stopped immediately. They were asking me everything from signing to consent to pay for the charges they would render to me today and insurance could not be filed to authorizing them to obtain my dental records from my current dentist. I proceeded to the receptionist and told her there was obviously a mistake, I was asked to fill out patient paperwork and that I was only there to redeem my gift certificate. She told me to proceed completing the paperwork so that they could keep it on file. I looked at her in disbelief and sat back down placing the pen under the clip. I guess she signaled the assistant who came out and retrieved my paperwork. I waited for over 30 minutes before they called me back. I followed the assistant back to a dental room and she handed me a box of strips and about 5 minutes of instruction. Do you have any questions? I said, "Are we done?", she said yes that's it. Hmm, so they led me to believe that the cleaning and polishing were part of my prize when really they were going to bill me for this when they were finished. I guess I didn't fall for their trap. Talk about deceitful, a good reputable business does not do business this way. I will not be back. I will still use my strips, but could have got them at Wal-mart for $12.00. What a joke. Watch out?

text: Love Vital Smiles for being multi-kid friendly,  however,  I feel the check in system could improve. name: Melody R
text: We used to like going here, never really had any problems. Of course there has always been a nice wait time but we decided to continue going there despite waiting a while to be seen. But this last time really made us change our mind. We have 3 children to receive updates on as they are being seen. As I sit down near my youngest daughter, and reach for my phone her hygienist tells me I have to leave because I have my phone out. I'm shocked, because I had just taken my phone out to return a text from my husband  as he wanted to know how the appointments were going. She would not continue my daughter's appointment until she escorted me out of the area. Now I completely understand businesses asking for cell phones to be turned on silent but to tell me that I cannot use my phone AT ALL is completely absurd! I have taken time from my off day to come to this business to bring my children and you're telling me I have to go to a consultation room just to use my phone.  I have already driven 30 minutes to come from my side of town, I  could have easily changed them to a Dr less than 5 minutes from home and had little to no wait time. In addition to all this, I'm trying to get information on my best friend who is in the ICU and no one knows what's going on because I can't use my phone to get the messages. Someone must have notified the manager because she came to talk, but she wanted to do it around my children and that was not going to happen. She should have asked to step away and then we could have talked.......... In other news, we won't be going  back.

text: I've been bringing my children for 10+ years.  The staff has always been friendly and have taken good care of my family. The staff has always been so polite and informative to my kids.

name: TaNecia Dudley
text: Updating my previous from 5 stars to 1 star... Our very first visit was easy, friendly, and fast... Every visit after that has been very slow and it’s always some paperwork to be done... Appointment was at 8 and we were here at 7:31 to be exact and the still didn’t get her back until almost 9... We were the first ones here and they called so many children before her. We will not be back!!!

name: Juicy
text: I love everything about Vital Smiles, their pleasant attitudes, clean facility, their level of patience and compassion are phenomenal. Their amazing. A nice family environment.

name: Terri Combs
text:
Appointment was scheduled 6 months in advance for 9:30a for 3 children ages 5, 3, & 2 years old.  It was 12:40 when we left.  Waited over 45 minutes in the back to be seen and it was extremely cold for me and the children.
Thankful, they were well behaved!  But, all children can become restless. Obviously and I realize you have a large clientele, however,  it could be that you are over booking appointments.

name: April Winston
text: Great place to go for braces.  The staff are very friendly and professional. There's never a long waiting period. Usually in and out under 45 minutes. I was also pleased to find out that Dr. Phillips practiced from different locations. Therefore when we moved across town, we were still close proximity to his office. I would recommend Dr. Phillips to everyone in need of an orthodontist.
