name: Nakiria jackson
text: I saw this dentist several years ago and I did not remember why I wasn't going to go back. I went in today for a cleaning and the minute he walked in the room I was reminded why I will never visit this office again. He is impolite, insensitive, and can't relate to me effectively. The ladies at the front desk are very nice and professional and so is the lady that cleaned my teeth. Needless to say I will never give him my business again.

name: Brian
text: I've been going to see Dr. Walker since I was 18. I'm 47 now. He's a very nice guy and knows his profession very well. I feel like I'm visiting family when I go there. Everyone is very nice to me and always answers any questions I may have. If you wanna keep your teeth looking good and feel comfortable doing it then go see Dr. Walker and his great staff.

name: Cortney Moon
text: Dr. Walker was absolutely amazing!  I have a true fear of the dentist and he and his staff made me feel very comfortable.  I would highly recommend him to anyone.

name: AJS Williams
text: Dr. Walker was absolutely great with my daughter, was so nervous and she said she couldn't even feel the shot. Girl up front was so patient with my insurance. No other place would try to help me with a estimate or take our brand. We will definitely be back to that office.

name: Melissa Crusoe
text: Dr. Walker is the best dentist I have had! He is very professional and knows his craft well! AND his staff is professional and very skilled! I highly recommend Dr. Thomas Walker's Dentristy for all your dentistry needs!

name: Richard Howell
text: Staff is incompetent and severly lacking in training. Worst dentist office I have ever been to. I am 58 yrs old and have had a lot of dental work done. These people don't have a clue about what they are doing. They will lie and make up things in an attempt to cover up their incompetence. Don't waste your money. Save yourself a lot of pain and definitely avoid this office.

name: Brittany Richards
text: Dr. Walker has been my dentist since I was a child. I'm almost positive he worked on my first tooth! Even as a kid I felt comfortable and loved him as my dentist. As an adult, I feel the exact same and have always been extremely loyal to Dr. Walker. His office is always clean, my visit is always fast and his staff are always wonderful to talk with. He moved from Irondale (originally up on the hill) to Trussville (closer to me so that's a win!) and I'd follow him again. My entire family uses Dr. Walker and I highly recommend him as a dentist for patients of any age. He's the reason I have the awesome smile I do! :)

name: Kathryn Lopresti
text: Friendly and experienced employees. They become like family after a few cleanings or dental work. I have seen Dr Walker over 15 years.

name: Crystal Hucks
text: Great atmosphere!! Very clean and patient oriented office..

name: Christian Collins
text: Very professional, calming and very thorough

name: Heather Snyder
text: The staff is amazing!!!!!!!!! Great experience they were very helpful and made me feel right at home  ! I will be back!!!!!!!

name: Mindy Lambert
text: I would highly recommend!!!

name: Sharon Foust-Mills (Sharon)
text: Great dentist. Had to get a tooth removed when root canal from a previous dentist went bad. He understands that you might be on a limited budget, he's straight forward about the priorities needing repaired.

name: Charlotte C
text: I'm giving this place one star ONLY because this program requires it to leave a rating.  BAD DENTIST.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!!! This dentist is BAD!  First of all he is VERY rough.  The front desk personnel AND the dentist have a BAD attitudes - perhaps being married and working together all day every day is not a good idea.  This dentist's hand are so big which causes even more problems for someone with a tiny mouth.  I had a filling replaced here, within a day it was obvious that something wasn't right so I returned to this dentist to have it repaired, he made an adjustment and after a week I was still having discomfort, when I called to get back in they couldn't fit me in right away and I had to travel out of town for a couple of months, as time went by the discomfort turned to PAIN.  When I returned home I made an appointment with a DIFFERENT dentist office to have the tooth/filling looked at - the filling was cracked and missing parts in 3 places and when this new dentist started taking it out - it was obvious that the filling material never set up properly as the filling was soft.  I would NEVER go to this dentist again for anything!!!!  AND they have very bad business practices because they refuse to give me a refund!  Perhaps it is time for him to retire!!!!!!!!  BAD DENTIST!!!

name: Brian Dasinger
text: Wonderful experience at Dr. Hart’s office!  Thorough check ups, great communication on billing and benefits, and painless dental work for my little ones!

name: Alia Mizelle
text: I do not recommend. I'm not sure what has happened since the previous reviews but it was not clean, cluttered and crunched into a tiny exam room, my husband and I both had appointments. The assistant was untrained and unfamiliar with the supplies he needed. Dr. Hart moved very slowly, bluntly placed the instruments on our chest in between using them, the exam and cleaning were both, the most painful and least thorough we've had. We drove 2 hours for a holistic dentist, not what their website portrays. If Dr. Hart is ill or they have fallen on hard times...God bless them but; the patient shouldn't be the one to suffer.

name: Theresa Yankovoy
text: I had a very relaxing and thorough dental cleaning. Melissa makes tooth cleaning seem like a gum massage. I am very sensitive, and Dr Hart and his staff really make me feel at home and relaxed. I travel to see him. I have tried local dentists, but I always go back to Hart. He is truly the very best dentist on the Gulf Coast.

name: RC 0093
text: They are very helpful and kind. I'm glad that I found them! They've worked with me, and helped me tremendously. Nothing negative about this place! The front desk and staff are all very pleasant in my experiences.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review we appreciate that very much!!

name: Leah Brymer
text: Great visit. Mr. Hart is a great dentist who share great information with you about your teeth/mouth health.

resp.text: Thanks for the great view that means alot to our practice!!

name: Roy Daniels
text: Dr.Dayton Hart really knows how to make his patients feel comfortable during their visits. The staff enhances this by being extremely genuine and nice at all times. Thanks guys. Can't wait for my next visit.

name: Jackson Gibbs
text: I honestly would recommend my dentist because he is beyond friendly and professional during each dental visit. He really goes out of his way to make you feel comfortable and explains everything thoroughly.

name: Jack Walker
text: Awesome dentist! Dr. Hart's office is actually quite peaceful, plus he is very nice. So if you are someone who gets nervous about dentist appointments, this would be a great place for you!

name: Madison Perekotiy
text: I love the team and their biological approach to dentistry. But their office majorly needs to be cleaned, organized and updated. Every room is very cluttered and not professional-looking. I also always wait 25-35 minutes after arriving, even when I arrive before my appointment time. Also it's very strange to me why, as biological dentists, they have a cookie baking oven in their waiting room and brochures from companies that use fluoride and other nonbiological dentistry tools.

name: Douglas Coleman
text: The dental hygienist that helped me was super professional as well as courteous. I have always had such a positive and informative dental visit every single time I go.

name: Steven Page
text: Dr. Hart is constantly going out of his way and beyond my expectations to help me as best he can and it's something i always notice and appreciate. He's a stand up guy and a wonderful dentist.

name: Thelma Santiago
text: Dr Hart  and his  staff  are  professional and  friendly. I  highly recommend him to all my friends and family.

name: Thomas Reed
text: I have many great things that I could say about Dr. Hart and his staff. I think the highest compliment I can pay them is for being a happy patient for over 20 years.

name: marie Kalantzis
text: This place is so unprofessional and not sanitized at all. Disorganized and cluttered, I felt like I needed to take a bath as soon as possible. Hygenist kept giving me excuses as to why their instruments didn't work, including their exray machine and had the gall to charge me $155 for half a cleaning, she told me I had some sort of gum infection but didn't offer anything to make it better. When i asked to see the dentist I was told he'll come in as soon as he was finished with his other patient, so I waited and waited till I decided to get up and go.What a dump. If I could rate this place as a zero I would have. STAY AWAY.

name: Arely Tapia
text: Front desk have a really bad attitude.

name: Becca Hogan
text: I have nothing but great things to say about Dr. Hart and his staff. I have never had any issues or concerns with his care in the three years I have been coming here. He is excellent at what he does and takes great care of his patients.

name: Patrick Larkin
text: Dr. Hart has always taken great care of me and my smile. He spends time with me at each appointment answering my questions and making sure I'm comfortable.

name: Robin Jones
text: Dr. Hart's been my dentist for a really long time now. Most of my family goes to him as well. The office is convenient and the staff is great.

name: Kirk A
text: The best thing about Dr. Hart is that he really cares about my health overall and helps me understand how my dental health effects the rest of my body. He is great.

name: Pauly Corletta
text: I've been coming to Dr. Hart since I can remember. He's a great guy and dentist, I wouldn't go to anyone but him and when I have kids they'll come here too.

name: Cassandra Lewis
text: The world needs more dentists like Dr. Hart. You have an amazing practice and I feel so at home in your care.

name: Alice Hearnsberger
text: Had a filling put in yesterday it was easy and it feels great today .The one that fell out was put in by Dr Hart 25 years ago and that was from hard sticky candy I was eating.HaHa any way Love his work

name: Jake Davis
text: I usually go to Dr. Hart for the regular cleanings and check up. I like how welcoming his staff is from the moment you walk in. Everyone's nice an they do great dental work.

name: Dave Smith
text: Great Dentist, I am a snow bird, broke a filling and he was able to get me right in. He was great. Very fast no pain could no ask for a better Dentist office.

name: Omar Chong
text: I called, asked a question about pricing, I believe Mr.Hart answered, he said I don’t know in a horrible tone and then proceeded to tell me to call back later because he was going to lunch.

name: Boat Man
text: As always I was treated with the utmost respect and given the care that any patient should expect. Thank you for what you do.

name: Amber Ray
text: I absolutely love going to New hope family dentistry. They are an amazing group of people and treat people like family. Today was my daughters first visit with them and Mrs. Tina was amazing with her. I will not go to another dentist office. Hands down the best office and people.

name: Kassandra Willoughby
text: I had a wonderful experience at New Hope Family Dentistry! Tina, Dr. Kyle Parks, and all of the other staff I encountered were genuinely kind and went above and beyond to answer my questions and address my concerns. I look forward to visiting again!

name: Elaine Alford
text: I had a broken tooth. They were so gentle treating it, I was amazed. Everyone helps you feel comfortable. Highly recommended!

name: Roy Sweatman
text: I gave 5 stars but they deserved 3x that. They are Great, I now look forward to going to the Denist. If you give them a try you may leave your current Denist.

name: Neil
text: Great staff and service!  Very accommodating and always pleasant. I recommend this practice to everyone.

name: Debbie Howard
text:
I thought I had a really good Dentist in the past, but Dr. Kyle Parks surpassed them all! Not only is he very knowledgeable, but he is kind and caring.
I had a lot of dental issues in the past, and recently, and Dr. Parks and his staff make me feel not so scared and took very good care of  me.
The girls in the front office are as nice & sweet as can be. Treated me with respect, and pretty much acted as if I were their only patient.
I feel blessed to have found such a great Dentist, along w/their wonderful staff. 🙂

name: Angie Underwood
text: This dental trip was very much past due for myself.Wonderful trip,the Dr was sooo good to me,as well as her assistant.I give these folks a 10!Never had a dental visit an taken laughs w the ladies whom helped me.I am truly grateful an anyone needs true dental care make an appointment w them,b4 u call anybody else.The charge was a good price,the care,an it took 2hrs to get my 2 teeth pulled,Dr added stitches too,incase I might needed them,takin thought about my after care at home,that's nice!!!

name: Ryoma
text: I called and friendly lady answered the phone. I tried to contact the dentist in the emergency number twice and he did not answer.

resp.text: Hi Ryoma, we received your voicemail but unfortunately it was breaking up and we couldn’t hear the entirety of your message. Please give us a call here at the office 256-723-8833 and we would be more than happy to help.

name: Dedra McCoy
text: I could not ask for better. They are some of the best people a person could meet. Our experience was the greatest. A person could not go wrong in making an appointment with these people. Very gentle.

name: Joy Cavins
text: Dr. Parks and her staff are friendly and helpful. I had a filling done. They checked on me several times while waiting for the anesthesia to work. Another thing I like about their office is the view from the windows... while the hygienist is working I can watch the clouds and birds.

name: Gitte Kirsopp
text: In and out in a ❤ beat.  Great staff great Doctor!!!!!

name: Greg Duke
text: The facility is nice, and the staff is super friendly! I am very pleased with my experiences here.

name: Melinda Lambert
text: Extremely beautiful and friendly office. Dr. Park’s was very informative and gentle. I will most definitely continue to go there. Thank you for all you did!!!!!

name: Jeff Jones
text: This was my first visit to this office. Dr. Parks and staff made me feel like I had been there a hundred times!! I had a toothache and had to have it pulled. This was by far the Best experience I’ve had with a dentist office!! I highly recommend this Dr and staff!!

name: Karen Funk
text: Wonderful experience with very professional staff!  I recommend this practice to anyone in need of a dentist.  I’m so happy I made the appointment!

name: Anna Burks
text: This is the BEST dentist I've ever been to. Dr Brittany was so great with me and very gentle. I will never go to another dentist.

name: Christie Haroldson
text: Went in for a tooth extraction and bone graft today. Dr. Parks made sure to explain everything thoroughly and answered all of my questions. She made me feel comfortable during my procedure and I didn’t feel any of it! I definitely recommend her and her husband! The staff there is extremely friendly and helpful, too! Great place!

name: Kim Ruf
text: The most wonderful hygienist, Tina, and Dentist Brittany is so knowledgeable and friendly.   Love that the chairs are massage and you can watch TV while getting your work done.  Best Dental Office ever!!

name: Louise Short Thull
text: I'm newer to the area and didn't have a dentist. I had a dental problem arise and they got me in that day. The reception staff were wonderful and Dr. Parks and Anna were amazing! I am going to make this my regular dentist!

name: Brian Burke
text: Excellent staff and expert doctors. Highly recommend!

name: Michael Snead
text: Would highly recommend, great in every way.

name: Edna F. Aldridge
text: I’ve had my second visit with Doctor Brittany Parks n I am so happy with her as my dentist. All the girls in the office including Doctor Parks make you feel so comfortable, they all are so warm n welcoming. I’m so happy Doctor Parks chose New Hope to practice. We’re very fortunate to have her.

name: Paula Smith
text: Today I went in and got to meet Dr.Parker (her). She was super nice and willing to give advice on what needed to be done. The staff is so welcoming and makes you feel like home. They are in no rush and everyone is so willing to listen. Highly recommend this office!

name: Jessica Fischer
text: This was our first visit as a family and they were AMAZING!! I would definitely recommend them. They are super friendly for kids and adults. You will not be disappointed.

name: Alabama Girl
text: The building it’s self is beautiful. Walking in my first impression is that it not only smells nice and clean, but looks it too! I’m so impressed with this dentist office. Everyone was SO nice and made sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed. I transferred from a Boaz dentist office to this one now that I’ve moved and I’m so looking forward to making this my dental office. Brittany Parks is an amazing dentist. So personable and genuine. Thank you guys!

name: Kay Howard
text: Great dentist and a great staff!! I never thought I would ever say that I love going to the dentist. Great experience and they truly care about you!!

name: Barbara Butler
text: I have been using New Hope Family Dentistry for years and love their entire crew.  I just met our new dentist and was greatly impressed by her and my conversation with her.  I highly recommend NHFD and know anyone who chooses to use them will be as pleased as I am.

name: Evelyn McElyea
text: First visit, felt so comfortable, grand daughter, got cleaning for the first time and was not stressing at all., Every one was extremely nice. I have to go to Oral Surgeon, and Dr. Parks got appointment fast for me, I'm so grateful. Marie

name: Tonya Douglas
text: The staff is so awesome and it's always clean. They have coloring activities for the children while they wait and awesome surprises in the treasure box at the end. The doc is so sweet and really cares for his patients. I highly recommend them for all of your dental needs.

name: Kalee Sullivan
text: Dr McMillan and his staff are the absolute best. I have avoided going to the dentist for 7 or so years due to having had bad experiences, this dentistry has completely changed that!! They are all so patient and compassionate. Highly recommended!!

name: rick hershell
text: Every body I met there had a great, friendly personality. I felt completely comfortable there. The dentist is super friendly and fair on price. ( I don't have insurance). It has a great down to earth, home like feel to the design of the building. I absolutely recommend it to any who needs great service with people that will take the nervousness right out of the stress of going to a dentist.

name: Rick Trussell
text: I love New Hope Family Dentistry! I had broken a tooth and went see what options Dr McMillan would give me. I was pleasantly surprised that gave me real options without trying to sell me anything! There was no pressure and he even offered to refer me to outside services.  The staff was knowledgeable, warm and friendly. I HIGHLY recommend these folks!!

name: Evelyn McElyea
text: First visit, felt so comfortable, grand daughter, got cleaning for the first time and was not stressing at all., Every one was extremely nice. I have to go to Oral Surgeon, and Dr. Parks got appointment fast for me, I'm so grateful. Marie

name: Natalie Royal
text: New Hope Family Dentistry has been our family dentist for over 3 years, we are blessed to have such an outstanding office in our little town. High tech and clean, we don’t know why anyone would drive to Huntsville or further. They have TVs on the ceiling for you to keep your attention off of what’s going on inside your mouth, AND MASSAGE CHAIRS!!!! The chairs are the best! Also, everyone we’ve met on the staff is fantastic! Don’t know how they remember our names when we are only in their Twice per year! If your looking for a dentist, check out New Hopes Family Dentistry!

name: Joseph Motes
text: Awesome family atmosphere and wonderful with little kids. My little girl was scared to death and didn’t like her old dentist. The team at New Hope Family Dentistry went above and beyond to make the experience as easy and stress free for her. Now my five year old loves going!

name: Ursula Usry
text: We just moved to the area and have been looking for a family dentist. Everyone was extremely professional and super nice. The staff was very thorough and skilled. My 7 year old was very comfortable and at ease here, They are wonderful with children!

name: Paula Waldrep
text: I've been using New Hope Family Dentistry for over 2 years and they are awesome.  Dr. McMillan and his staff are so nice. I am currently having an implant done and Dr. McMillan is doing a great job absolutely no pain was felt during the placement of the screw.  I would highly recommend New Hope Family Dentistry to anyone needing dental work.

name: Diane Mahan
text: I hate to say this but I procrastinated for years and years I’m talking in the 50 years 🤦🏽‍♀️ To go to a dentist because I was so scared of them !! Has I only knew this place existed they were so nice and made me feel so comfortable and at home !! They have changed my whole perspective and I wouldn’t go anywhere else !! They are awesome to the front office to the hygienist to Dr Mcmillian!! Awesome wonderful people and my teeth and me are so happy I found them in my life 😍

text: I've been using New Hope Family Dentistry for over 2 years and they are awesome.  Dr. McMillan and his staff are so nice. I would highly recommend New Hope Family Dentistry to anyone needing dental work.

name: Joseph Motes
text: Awesome family atmosphere and wonderful with little kids. My little girl was scared to death and didn’t like her old dentist. The team at New Hope Family Dentistry went above and beyond to make the experience as easy and stress free for her. Now my five year old loves going!

name: Carol Wiley
text: What a welcoming place this is! A very attractive building on the outside with a warm, comfortable reception area. But best of all is the staff -- very friendly yet professional with 5-star customer service!  An added bonus -- massaging dentistry chairs and ceiling-mounted TVs so you can relax while getting your cleanings and dentistry work done! I highly recommend Dr. McMillan and this dental practice!

name: Carol Lochran
text: It’s nice to be in a place where every employee is polite, accommodating to each request, and professional. Their smiles tell you all. Of course the dentist sets the climate. He is friendly, like able, equipped with all modern instruments and good. I would recommend them to anyone

name: Tonya Guthrie
text: Great family focused dentistry! My family of 6 all come here and love it. They are easy to work with. Highly recommend them.

name: Dyazzmine Lashea
text: I love this dentist it’s the best place to come. The employees are very sweet and take their time with you! I would highly recommend anyone to this dentist.

name: Elizabeth Myers
text: Every member of the staff is super friendly.  I felt very comfortable and relaxed .  Lori did a great job cleaning my teeth and explaining things as she went along.  The building was beautiful and clean and modern. I am happy to recommend them!

name: Brandy Wilson
text: Tina is amazing. She makes sure I’m comfortable at all times. I love coming to the dentist. Everyone greets with a smile and a kind word.

name: Stacey Guerin
text: Love coming here. Every experience has been outstanding. I drive 45 minutes but 100% worth it. Highly recommend this dental office with Dr. McMillan and his wonderful staff.

name: Michelle Dixon
text: It's been a long time since I've been to the dentist, but my experience was great! They made me feel comfortable, cared what I had to say, and the dentist offered me real, honest advice. I appreciate their service very much and will be returning for more routine visits in the future.

name: Susan Bates
text: Dr Parks is very nice & considerate with her patients. She did a great job & no pain! Great bunch of girls that work there. Tracy is very personable.

name: Lorna Light
text: Just had a dental implant. It was much, much easier than I anticipated. NO, and I mean NO pain. The staff is friendly and concerned about you during the entire procedure. If you need any work or even routine procedures, I highly recommend Dr. McMillan and his staff. It is a "home town" kind of place where you are always welcome and cared for.

name: Wilton Green
text:
Going to this dentist office is one place
you don’t mind - very friendly, efficient and professional. The staff and doctors put you
at ease right away. I can recommend them completely for anyone seeking top notch dental
care.😁

Wilton Green
Owens Cross Roads

name: Kathy Robertson
text: Absolutely love Dr. McMillan. Would highly recommend him. Best dental experience I've ever had. Wouldn't even consider any other dentist.

name: Leland Browner
text: The hands down best dentist in  North Alabama. You will not find a more caring and concerned dentist. Nor will you find a more compassionate and competent dentist. The staff from front office to assistant and hygienist are fantastic and patient oriented. Highly recommend Dr. Dugald McMillan and New Hope Family Dentistry! I love them!

name: Terra Martin
text: I absolutely love this place my dad needed emergency care and they worked us in very fast the staff there is very kind and caring and the doctor is simply wonderful my children even go and he makes them feel so comfortable!!!! Best dentist ever

name: Abby Graham
text: This is the best dentistry I’ve been to! The staff is so sweet and nice! They treat you right and they clean your teeth the best in the Huntsville area!

name: Sherry Anderton
text: The new hope family dentistry is a great one to go to  and the works are very nice and sweet. They were very nice and good to my mother and I could not ask for a better dentistry then that . I hope to get my daughter in with them very soon.

name: Marty Cole
text: The staff was very happy, and made the experience enjoyable. The Dentist was professional, knowledgeable,  and took the time to explain everything. I traveled for over two hours to visit this Dentist and will gladly do it again! The only regret I have is that this office isn't in my hometown! Thanks again to everyone at New Hope Family Dentistry!

name: Misty Quick
text: I really recommend New Hope Dentistry. Dr. McMillan is a wonderful and friendly dentist and the staff is wonderful as well! Example, I have braces and I had a wire to come undone and I also I had to be on my bus route (I drive a school bus) I had 15 minuets to get to my route and Dr. McMillan took me in and fixed it for me! (Made it to bus route on time as well.)

name: Rachael Cook
text: A comfortable and home like atmosphere. The staff are super friendly. My three kids love coming here. They say yeah my turn. They give excellent dental work!

name: Rhonda Rock
text: My first visit here I have definitely found my new family dentist!!! Friendly , courteous, great sense of humor, and almost painless!!! Definitely a five star business.

name: Angelique' 76
text: I have all good things to say about my visit. The ladies up front always makes me feel welcome and informed. Doc is wonderful and calms my anxiety about having teeth pulled.

name: Karen Artis
text: New Hope Family Dentistry is my favorite of the dentists I have been to by far. Dr. Dugald McMillan and his staff are exceptional. They are kind and caring and help make for an easy dental visit. I highly recommend them.

name: Holly Green
text: I have been to many different dentists and this one is by far my favorite! I live an hour away but will make the drive any day to come here! Everyone is so friendly and caring when you come in! Dr. McMillan is the best dentist and he definitely cares about his patients! He calls and follows up on oral procedures to make sure everything is going good and there aren't any problems. They have worked with me throughout my pregnancy to make sure that what needs fixed gets fixed and that we don't cause harm to the baby in any way. I couldn't ask for a better or friendlier dentist to go to! I recommend this dentist to anyone!

name: L Stroud
text: I recently had dental implants done by Dr. McMillan and could not be more pleased. The procedure itself was  basically painless and there was only minor discomfort afterwards. I have previously used oral surgeons for this type of dental work, but from now on, I will definitely be calling on Dr. McMillan. He is the nicest person and it's very easy to discuss your concerns with him. He and his entire staff are the friendliest folks you would ever hope to meet and they will go out of their way to help you and make you feel comfortable from the moment you walk in the door. OUTSTANDING in every way!

name: James Coquat
text: Super friendly, professional, and efficient team!

name: Diane Harding
text: I absolutely love this place and their staff. My kids use to go all the way in Huntsville and i switched them closer to home. I am so happy i did and I would recommend them to anyone

name: Lynda Hoagland
text: Going to the dentist at New Hope Family Dentistry is a wonderful experience! The office is lovely, and I get to watch t.v. and get a massage while my teeth are cleaned! The staff is sweet and efficient. Dr. McMillan is worth every minute of the 40 minute drive from work to their office!! Highly recommend New Hope Family Dentistry!

name: Brandy Ikard
text: Dr. McMillan and his staff are wonderful! From the moment you walk in they make you feel welcome. They are not only professional but personable. Dr. McMillan takes as much time as you need to explain and answer any questions or concerns you have. You do not feel rushed in any way. He is excellent with our kiddos as well. I highly recommend New Hope Family Dentistry.

name: Gena Britton
text: This is the best dental office ever! Doc and his staff are very gentle and make sure your visit is as comfortable as possible! Also, everyone is very friendly, I would highly recommend this office!

name: Barbra Gilbert
text:
Dr. McMillan, dental  assistants, and hygienist have provided my husband and I with excellent quality work and service. The hygienist provides the deep tissue work my husband requires saving him a trip to Huntsville. This is the first dentist to provided me with an upper dentures that fit perfectly the first time with no adjustments. The partial was took some work. The office staff is extremely competent and helpful with appointments, insurance issues and has even provided me a report needed for a taxes.
Personal comfort, excellent care and professionalism is what I expect and receive.
Would I recommend Dr. McMillan?  YES, I have and do.

name: Nikki Sumner
text: This is the best dentist that I have ever been to. I went in last week with a toothache that was not really hurting anymore. Dr. McMillan told me I needed a root canal.so I schedule it. Well as the week went on my tooth didn't hurt. I almost canceled my appointment but decided to go in anyways. When he came in the room I asked him are you sure I need this done. I dont want to go through any unnecessary pain. He allowed me to watch him perform the test on each tooth on the upper right side. After that I agreed it need to be done. He could tell I was nervous so he offered yo do a live camera so I could see what he was doing. All I can say is "IT WAS AMAZING." Thank you to all the wonderful staff at New Hope Family Dentistry.

I , his wife , called, WA called. Expensive clinic and a wonderful doctor! You need to change the receptionist.  A clinic that works to provide services should probably at least answer incoming calls.

text: I have been treated by Apex for over a year and wanted to wait a bit on a review. This is a great dentist and dental office. They're always on time friendly and he can do more than most dentists with the state of art equipment he has at his office. He did an extraction in his office saving me a lot of money if I had gone to a Maxillofacial surgeon. I have had several crowns and in process of an implant, no rework and no problems to date. Again, no waiting. And did I say the staff is friendly its a positive environment.

text: Amazing team. They treat you like family. Always friendly and professional.

name: Donny Black
text: My daughter worked for him. When they hired her he knew she needed more training. When she would try to work he would huff and puff at her which made her more nervous instead of teaching her. When he let her go he said their personalities didn’t fit and she was to shaky. Wouldn’t u be shaky with someone like that??? He basically told her that her certificate she got hurt her more than helped. Now after years of wanting to be an assistant and go into dental hygiene she says she doesn’t want to because she feels like she can’t do it. He basically ruined her dream. I don’t feel like u should treat ur employees like that. We should uplift and not tear people down and ruin what they wanted to do with their life. He should have never hired her if he didn’t want to teach. His assistant would also yell at her and told her that’s how u learn. The assistant also told her to do something wrong and she got blamed so she told him it wasn’t her. We was told this was the real reason he let her go. I feel he owes her an apology and to tell her she shouldn’t give up on herself. How would he like it if it was his child???

name: Hannah Bush
text: I could not have picked a better place! Ashley from the front desk made me comfortable and feel like apex really cared from the very beginning. She was professional, caring, and friendly! How many dentist offices can say they check on their patients in pain between the time you make the appointment and the actual date of the appointment? Apex can. Ashley took the time to text to check on me throughout the week and that really says something about the type of people they are.  Second, the dental assistant I had was phenomenal! Cora was so awesome and easy to work with, i think we laughed more than we did anything! She was so patient and gentle and it is so obvious she cares and loves what she does! She made me feel so relaxed, like we were old friends! She made the root canal experience almost fun if it wasn’t for the fact that i was there for a root canal! Dr. English made me feel as comfortable as I could have felt in an uncomfortable situation. He was very easy to get along with and has a great table side manner, not to mention he was quick and great at his job! I have plenty of dental work to look forward to in the future and I won’t go anywhere else as long as I can help it. Apex dental blew my mind away and there isn’t a better place to go in my opinion.

resp.text: Thank you Hannah. We are happy to hear that during these unusual times our staff came through! We look forward to seeing you and your family in the coming months. Welcome to the Apex Dental family.

name: John White RCDD
text: I found Dr. English and his team about two years ago. I will remain a faithful patient until he retires and then I’ll bug him to come back if I need a filling. Let me save you some time. Look no further, Dr. English and his team are by far the most professional and understanding dental practice in the country. I travel for hours to receive my dental care here. I’ve had cleanings to bridges to fillings and every single time was five stars. This man will not stop until it’s right - he takes no shortcuts and is as honest and as straightforward as is gets. I would put my life in this doctors hands and not have a worry in the world. He hand picks his team and chooses only the most motivated and brilliant techs and office staff. There are not enough stars available to rate the value and professionalism of this dental practice. Trust me when I tell you to put down your mobile device and make an appointment - you’ll be very happy you took my advice.

text: Dr. English did a root canal for me a couple of weeks ago. The technology they have at the office is top of the line, and after only a few days they received my permanent crown and I was able to have it put on during my lunch break. I loved that I did not have to wait in the waiting room on either visit. I highly recommend this business and I am returning next week to begin annual cleanings!

text: Pleasant atmosphere, friendly staff, and they did an excellent job. I did not feel the discomfort from the dental work that I have felt at visits with other practitioners.  Dr. English and Apex staff are the best!

name: Michelle Gilmore
text: Listen y'all, I normally don't leave reviews,  i let folks know when they do a great job while I'm there. Dr English and his ENTIRE staff are the most professional, kind, knowledgeable, and compassionate people I've encountered in my life! No lie, I'm a complete wimp when it comes to dentistry. I've suffered from dental anxiety all of my life. I've always opted for extractions over getting a filling, and i had to be put under anesthesia first. I was a true phobic, until yesterday. The second his staff called to confirm my appointment, i truly felt in her voice that i wasn't just some faceless voice over the phone. She was so genuine and could relate to my fears. Upon arrival, i was continously greeted by the most beautiful, empathetic, professional staff. Every single person was not only physically beautiful, but genuinely beautiful from the soul. Now, you can't learn that. Thats something thats ingrained deep within and it simply flows out when you're doing something you love.  I don't know about y'all,  but I've literally been around the world and unequivocally, I've yet to frequent an establishment where EVERYONE makes you feel, like you're the only person there! Got my teeth cleaned and didn't feel a thing! She was AMAZING! Never has this happened before, to me. My gums normally hurt for a few days. Yesterday, Dr English took my hand and he promised me that my procedures this morning wouldn't hurt. I was so very skeptical. When i walked in, i felt like a jitterbug! I was literally having a secret panic attack. Well, Dr. English and his staff had me covered. When i say, "yo, it didn't hurt"...what I mean is, "it really didn't hurt!" At one point, i felt a little pressure, but he was all over it in 2 seconds flat! Bottom line up front: Dr. English and his staff are all easy on the eyes, beautiful from the heart, extremely knowledgeable, professional,  and courteous.  I went back to work and told everyone i saw about them at Apex Dental in Madison,  Alabama! No, I'm not sponsored. Wasn't paid for this review, and my opinions are all my own. If you need quality dental work, want to experience pain free dental, and patronize an establishment that "brings customer service back", then look no further! They have it figured out! I love these guys! The entire staff rocks...everyone of them! Don't just take my word, please go see for yourselves.

name: Cindy Slovak
text: Dr.English and his crew have been our family's dentist  and practice for the long haul.  I can't say enough good things about them all. Ashley is amazing about letting you know when your appointment is and rescheduling to fit your busy life. Her sass and wit are nerve soothing. Susan, Felica, Lee, and Oliva are friendly, caring, and great at their jobs. It's like Professionalism and Great Bedside Manners had a baby and these girls are them lol. I usually hate dentists and put off going to see one to a crazy level of stupidity...but never once have I ever made to feel like a disgusting patient. None of my appointments have ever been painful or a nightmare. Dr.English is a wonderful dentist, his skill is definitely the Apex of dentistry. Love this place and highly recommend them!!!

name: Matrix Tools, LLC
text: DO NOT GO TO THIS DENTIST!!!!!!!  worst dentist experiences i've ever had in my life!!  first i got a bridge put in here and i had a migraine for a month..  then i reschedule my next appointment, and i'm perfectly happy with my appointment time..  for some reason they call me every day asking if I can come in earlier.  Finally one day I say, ok fine, what do you have today Ill see if i can make it.  They say 2:45, and I say ok.  I tell my boss and make all the arrangements to go to this early appointment just because they requested me to do so..  there is an accident on the way and it takes me longer to get there, i get there at 3:00 instead of 2:45, and they said because i was 15 minutes late they could not take me..  they actually had me wait in the lobby for 15 minutes before they called me back into an office room and explained to me why because i was a little late I lost my appointment.  So it took me 30 minutes to get there because of traffic, they had me wait for 15 minutes in the office, and they told me they couldn't help me at all...  the only reason i was in the office that day was because they requested me to come in for an earlier appointment.  it was a huge pain to ask off to get to their office and for them to put their time schedule far above my own time schedule was incredibly rude.  i will never never never go back.  horrible experience.  if you go here, you better never be late for an appointment and like migraine headaches.  i'm 35 years old i've been to many many dentists, the service i received at apex dental literally makes me sick. i've never been treated so badly in my life.

name: Sharee Sanders
text: They seemed nice. I had a problem with a tooth and am pregnant. They seemed like they were sympathetic and scheduled the next available they could. When I arrived, the dentist seemed extra friendly to everyone else. My 4 year old daughter was with me. They called me back and immediately tried to do the panaram xray. I'm pregnant and can only do a small xray for emergencies. They seemed confused and had to ask someone about it. Then they took me to my room and told my daughter (who is 4) that she had to stay 3 rooms away in someone's office of whom she has never met. She was scared. I had to take her and leave her. Then they seemed confused why my scared little girl wouldn't follow them back to my room and sounded exasperated. I went and got her (which was my intention from the beginning anyhow). Then they told me they wanted to pull two of my teeth and I said I had to think about that. Then a lady came in and yelled at her because her foot was on the wall. There wasn't anywhere for her to sit in the first place and they placed a 4 year old on a spinning stool that was against a wall. Dug! Then they came in and laid out all of their instruments to pull my teeth when I never agreed to that treatment.. Just an overall bad taste in my mouth visit.

name: Dale Edinger
text: Dr. Rutledge is the BEST dentist I've had in my 55 years of life!!!...Knowledgeable, easy-to-understand and a great chair-side manner...All the staff, from front-desk, to technicians to insurance/checkout clerks a friendly, caring down-home folks... Had cleanings to removals and never have I felt more at ease than with Dr. Rutledge and this staff!!!...

name: Jamie Jenkins
text: I'm new to the area as of June 2020. I've had lots of Dental work in the past and so I'm the nervous type. The hygienist Kelsey was so super sweet and talked me through everything. Dr. Rutledge was even better! He talked me through our game plan and made me feel so reassured that I'd be greatly taken care of. At the end of my appointment I had to schedule my next one and Kelsey asked the receptionist to put me on her schedule. That made me feel awesome!!! I'm so glad I've chosen this clinic to be my forever dentist!!

name: Tina Schutz
text:
I had my very first toothache at 45 years-old and I was given Dr. Rutledge’s name by a friend but warned that he was difficult to get into see. I called on a Monday and received an appointment just two days later on Wednesday, February 11, 2021 at 2:00pm. I was there 30 minutes before my appointment and sent a text (as requested by the office) to let them know I was there.

Jada brought out the paperwork I needed to fill out as a new patient and requested I text the office phone number when finished. She took my insurance card and driver’s license to make copies while I filled out the very simple paperwork. The paperwork was basic and took no time at all. I sent a message when I was ready.

Shannon was Dr. Rutledge’s assistant. She did my X-ray where the toothache was and talked with me and about my dental history. I was comfortable with her immediately. She explained everything she was going to do before she did it.

Dr. Rutledge came in and was INCREDIBLE! He diagnosed what was wrong quickly. I was super surprised to find out I had a cracked tooth! He went over all options with me and we chose the best plan for me. My appointment with him was set up as a consultation only and I was afraid it would be a while before I could get in to have the work done he suggested but boy was I wrong!

Casey is the wonderful lady who is in charge of checking out Dr Rutledge’s patients and she set up my appointment for m, MONDAY, February 15, 2021! I only had to wait four days to have the work done! Casey is a ROCKSTAR!

I will return on Monday, February 15, 2021 to have a crown and possible root canal. I’m not nervous at all. I know that I am in great hands with the ladies of the office and Dr. Rutledge is just a bonus!! Stay tuned for the review post procedure!!!!

name: Brian Steiner
text: This place is absolutely awesome! Dr Rutledge was really cool and explained to me in detail any questions I had. Also, the hygienist I had was the best! Actually looking forward to coming back for my next appointment!

resp.text: We're looking forward to your next appointment, too!

name: Penelope Taylor
text: I messaged Dr Martin after hours for a bad toothache. He called me right back and had me in first thing the next morning. I’m a baby when it comes to teeth and he is always so caring and mindful. His staff are also genuinely nice and helpful.

resp.text: We're so glad that we were able to help!

name: Nancy Litch
text: My appointment was on time. The practice uses careful COVID-19 precautions. The hygienist did an excellent job cleaning my teeth. Dr. Rutledge was timely and thorough in his examination. Everyone was very friendly and professional. I highly recommend this dental practice.

resp.text: Thank you, Nancy! Glad we made you feel safe.

name: Josie Frantz
text: I highly recommend this dentist ! I had a dental emergency and they were the only ones who got me in . They are also very friendly and Dr Rutledge was great very good beside manor .

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Josie!

name: Karen Wise
text:
Professional and everyone was very kind.
Would definitely recommend!!

name: John Lankford
text: Very good crew and excellent staff, service and professional advise. Not only care for their patients dental health but provide extended services for healthy looking smile 😃! Highly recommend this dental 🦷 practice and all that comes with it !

resp.text: Thank you for recommending us, John!

name: Keisha Triplett-Ellis
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Rutledge for at least 6 years if not longer and he is pretty amazing! He is professional, kind, caring, and passionate about what he does. I started with him when I worked In Gulfshores and I stayed with him (even though I drive from Loxley) because there is nobody I trust more to take care of my teeth.

resp.text: Thank you for staying with us all these years, Keisha!

name: Summer Phillips
text: From speaking with Casey at the front desk to Emily as my dental hygienist and speaking with Dr. Martin, I couldn’t have asked for a better first time experience.  I will be returning for more work, but as someone with some severe anxieties about dental work, I believe I am in very good hands.

resp.text: We'll look forward to seeing you again, Summer!

name: Dr. Nikki Cottis
text: I had a great experience for a routine cleaning. When I called to make my appointment, the girls at the front were friendly and knowledgeable. They were very timely with my appointment. I highly recommend both doctors!

name: Karen Payton
text: Staff always friendly and courteous, my hygienist Michele was wonderful.

name: Tammye Dearing
text: The staff and doctors were friendly and very helpful. I felt very comfortable being my first time there. Was able to go in the day I called with a toothache. I was shocked but very happy since I was hurting. Would highly recommend.

resp.text: We are so happy that we were able to get you in and solve that toothache. Thank  you for choosing to come to us!

name: Sleepless SLPLSSINAL
text:
Love Dr. Martin And entire team very friendly, caring and gentle.
Looking forward to my next visits.

resp.text: We look forward to seeing you too!

name: melissa harris
text: They got me in 5 min early. Everyone had a mask on.  the dental office was very clean. Very nice dentist I've seen them both in the past and they are both great  they knew I was really worried about covid got me in got me out. felt very comfortable at this office. Deffinatly would recommend

resp.text: We are so grateful that you had a wonderful experience with us! We are so excited to see you when you need us again!

name: Frances Squire
text: I needed an emergency visit because of a broken crown. Dr. Rutledge and his staff were highly professional and did a great job on a temporary repair and referred me to an oral surgeon for further work. My visit was during the Covid-19 pandemic and I was very comfortable with their measures to make sure everyone was safe.  I won’t hesitate to become a regular patient.  On top of this all, they were very nice people too.

text: It's very hard to brag on Dr. Rutledge and his staff because my last dentist when I lived in Texas was one of my best friends. As a good friend of my dentist I was treated like a king and could call anytime day or night. I was very sad to lose that connection. I moved to Gulf Shores and went to a new dentist for the first time on over 20 years. I could not be happier!!! These guys are great and make me feel just as important. I have never waited more than 10 minutes on any of my appointments.

name: Caleb Terry
text: The dentist always makes me incredibly nervous but the staff were very friendly and reassuring. Dr. Rutledge was great and talked me through everything he was doing. I’ll be scheduling all my future appointments there!

name: Jim Meyer
text: Outstanding professionalism!! Absolutely delighted that they were recommended to us. Now, we can refer them also - and, we will.

text: Get your wallet ready, exaggerated high prices for teeth implans, Although it does good work with easy things, Dr Rutledge did unprofessional filling on a teeth (+1 more person )wich later on caused a lot of pain needing another visit to a different doctor to solve the issue, do some research before visit.

The staff is awesome from the the time i made a phone call to be seen while traveling to Gulf Shores  until i checked out. Very friendly and welcoming environment. If you need a dentist in the Gulf Shores area you will not be disappointed. Pain free as well for my emergency filling.

name: Ashlea Palmer
text: I am a big baby when it comes to going to the dentist however when I moved to Gulf Shores 8 years ago I knew I needed to find a new dentist to continue my yearly check ups/cleanings. She told me about her wonderful experience with him as well as his staff with them making her feel comfortable and taking their time with her as she was very anxious. Once I heard this I knew I had to see him. It was the best decision I ever made. The staff accommodates you when you're nervous and especially for ones like me who have very sensitive teeth. My whole family sees Dr Martin and have had nothing but wonderful experiences. I highly recommend him!!

Thanks for being not just dedicated professionals in your field, but good friends and upstanding citizens of the Alabama Gulf Coast community. They make going to the dentist a pleasurable experience!

They are the Best.

text: Simply the best dental experience one could hope for. The team there is very professional, considerate and caring. The way they approach things will make one want to continue going there. We are very pleased with this practice.

text: Wonderful staff and so friendly at the Northcutt Dental located in Helena! I typically dread going to the dentist but everyone made sure I was comfortable. Definitely recommend this dental practice!!

name: Angel Tillman
text: I really wanted to like this dentist's office.  It's very efficient and clean.  The work is done promptly.  I did not care for the first hygienist I had, so I asked to have her replaced.  The second was much better and the third hygienist was the best I've ever had.  However, when I first switched to Northcutt, it was because my previous dentist retired.  I was told that a filling I had received needed to be replaced.  I was reluctant, because it wasn't giving me any pain or problems, but I had it replaced.  After the replacement, the dentist said he needed to replace his own work (no charge)  so he did.  Then I started having a lot of pain from the 2nd replacement.  He worked on it a 3rd time.  The last time I went in, he expressed that the whole tooth needed to be crowned - lest I eventually need a full root canal.  (this time charged of course)  Needless to say, I will have to be getting a second opinion.  I cannot have the same tooth worked on 5 times unless it truly is necessary.

name: Jody Glass
text: Great staff. Goes the extra mile to make you comfortable. Speaks with you through out the visit to keep you informed.

text: I haven't been to a dentist in a long time. They took the time to explain to me what was going on, calmed my worries, and handled me with care. Couldn't recommend them enough.

Kind and gentle care. Very personable staff. And I didn't feel judged for not having taken better care of my dental health. They just wanted to help me get better.

Friendly staff from the telephone call through the stitches.

text: The staff at Northcutt is always kind and courteous. They also do an amazing job explaining out of pocket cost that allow patients to plan better for future care.

They play Christian music and ask if you want to learn more about Christ on the initial paperwork. They are extremely dedicated to comfort for the patient. And they somehow cost less !!!!

When you enter Northcutt Dental Helena, it definitely is an experience. With the smell of fresh baked cookies & freshly brewed Kureg Coffee what’s not to like about that!
The Business Associate, at the front desk greet you by standing with a friendly welcome home smile, the Living Room is absolutely beautifully decorated and very clean! The whole office is state of the art!!

Tyndall was my Hygienist. She was AWESOME! She was very thorough & and explained everything to me.

Dr. Yarnell & Dr. Nguyen are both Great!

name: Linda ingram
text: I have seen Northcutt Dental commercials for several years but this visit was even better than commercial. Staff was unbelievably welcoming and friendly yet, comfortably professional. I was offered bottled water, watched HGTV with no down time, received attention from at least 4 staffers who all called me by name including a pop in visit from Dr Gyuen  (sic) which was unexpected.  All I can say about Northcutt customer service is wow!

text: They are just awesome!  Best dentist I've ever had.  They make you feel comfortable.   They're easy on your teeth.  I had 2 pretty good - sized cavities filled and i dont feel sore like you've been massacred.  They do an excellent job!   If you have anxiety regarding dentist,  you need to try them to try them:)

text: Today was my first time to go to Northcutt Dental office. From the moment I walked in the door I felt welcomed the staff were so nice. My Family and I won't be going anywhere else but there. Thank you for all the information and wonderful experience.

name: Tammy
text: Everyone was nice and they were all very professional and the work I had to have done was excellent!

name: William Shannan Seelmann
text: The admin staff is friendly and the office is nice and clean. The porcelain crown I had done less than a year ago not only came off tonight but it also has a hole all the way through it. The assistant who adjusted it before it was cemented did not listen to anything I said when she was fitting and drilling on it. I told her the contacts were too tight, but she insisted on adjusting the occlusal (biting surface) until here we are less than a year later with a useless crown. Since we've already moved from Helena, I can't even get Northcutt Dental to make this right. Insurance only pays for 1 crown per tooth every 5 years... I would not recommend this place!

resp.text: I want to thank you for talking with us to discuss your issue. It is our goal to make sure our patients are raving fans of NDP and we want to do all that we can to address your needs upfront. We are sorry that you had this experience and hope you were pleased with our quick response & solution to your concern.

name: Gloria McGee
text: Dr. Ward and the staff at Northcutt are very professional and friendly. The office is very contemporary and welcoming. The staff are all very gentle when administering treatment.  I would highly recommend Northcutt to all for your dental needs.

name: Kakki Brown
text:
A great experience from the moment I walked through the doors! A professional and exceptionally friendly staff who answered all my questions and provided me information to help on future visits. I definitely recommend this Helena based dental practice  to anyone who wants affordable, professional dental care. Special thanks to Dr Yarnell, Tyndall, Sharon, Cynthia, and Katearia. (Hope I got spellings correct!)
Northcutt Dental has become my new dental "home."

name: Alan Farmer
text: The staff at the Helena location are awesome! I took my 16 year old son in for a check-up and cleaning and he really enjoyed it. I highly recommend Northcutt Dental in Helena!

name: Zahir Merchant
text:
Stay away if you value your money.

They quoted me $17k for my dental work, went somewhere else (which had to redo my x-rays for free because the Northcutt ones were so poor in quality) and they quoted me for around $4k without my insurance, just around $1.5k with it.

The red flag for me to get a second opinion was when they kept pushing a $15 enamel toothpaste. If you look it up on Amazon, you can get the exact same toothpaste in a two pack for the same price.

If a dental office is willing to sell you toothpaste with a 100% markup, you have to imagine what else they're taking advantage of you on.

To be fair, the staff is friendly, and the office is very very nice with games for kids.

But this price gouging is ridiculous, and I think someone has to acknowledge it.

My only complaints were they only offered the white fillings when several insurance companies will only pay for silver, while I personally prefer the while on visible teeth I know some people can not afford to pay the difference. My second complaint which is really minuscule was I had a little trouble finding the building with it being behind the pediatrician's office and in the same parking lot without a sign at each parking  lot entrance. text: My husband, B, had the most amazing experience here! I know...I know...you’re thinking, “How can anyone have an amazing experience at the dentist?” Well, let me tell you. He had a pretty rough time, my husband. He was in a real bad way when he arrived there, and Dr. G did not mince his words. He (probably) said, “Yeah, my man...you’re gunna lose that tooth.” Now, my B was in immense pain and seriously considering pulling his own tooth with a pair of dirty garage pliers. Dr. G (probably) said, “Nay, sir. There’s no need for that. Take these antibiotics, and I’ll see you on Monday to exorcise that evil spiritual entity from your mandible.” Brian was henceforth treated with the absolute best dental care that he’s ever received, and we, as a family, will (not probably—definitely) be forever clients at Deerfoot Dental!

name: Angela Cross
text:
I'll leave my original review below because it still stands however I’d like to update to say while everyone is very nice there you should stay on top of your own benefits and find out ahead of time how much every single thing they do will cost you and then call your insurance yourself and verify that it will be covered (probably a good practice anyway obviously but I just assumed they were on top of it since I was only initially charged a copay only to find out a month later that so much work was done (in a couple of appointments) in an overlapping way that my benefits we're maxed out and they still continued to do more work after that that I wasn't aware wouldn't be covered so I now have a massive bill from them that I definitely didn't see coming. Like I said probably my own fault for trusting someone else to have my best interest in mind and to be on top of something like that but lesson very painfully learned.)

Original review

I have terrible dental anxiety but everyone at Deerfoot Dental has gone above and beyond to help ease that. I highly recommend Deerfoot Dental especially to those who are generally nervous about visiting the dentist. The team here from the girl doing your billing and appointments to the nurses and doctor are all genuinely warm and kind. No long waits and they get you scheduled quickly and efficiently for any follow-up care. Overall great place.

name: Dennis Olinger
text:
So my two year old son fell and busted his mouth on our driveway one evening. His front tooth got knocked in and was terribly crooked. Blood was everywhere...
My wife was at work..and needless to say..I was a little panicked. My wife came home and we started calling dentists. We came to find out that most dentists are closed on Friday..and it was Thursday evening when this occurred. My son has been a patient at Deerfoot Dental since his teeth really started coming through. We left a message after hours and Dr. Grovestein called us back! He asked us to text him photos of my sons teeth. We sent the pics and he called us back. He reassured us that it probably wasn’t as bad as it seems and he would meet us at his office the next morning. So he opened his clinic for us on his day off! I mean who does that? He gave us instructions to care for the tooth, we made a follow up appointment, and left. Needless to say..our sons tooth looks great. It actually straightened out almost back to its original spot. We went to our follow up appointment and got the good news that his teeth looked great and to just keep a watch on it. I have never in my life experienced customer service from a healthcare provider like this. We are still in shock that someone would care so much about the wellbeing of our son. They have earned a customer for life.

resp.text: It was my pleasure to check your son! Thank you for the kind words!

text: Very rude unprofessional group. I called back, I asked for a supervisor, I was told a supervisor would call me, (mind you none of my information was asked for) I asked her is she was gonna take my information, in a smart tone she said "We have called ID", I explained to her I was calling from work and wanted them to call me back on my cell phone, well then she proceeded to remember who I was. Please do not waste your time here, they do not care about you nor your health and the also will not allow you to make payments on your bill. Normally I go to the dentist at home but it was an emergency. I woke up one morning with a lot of pain and swelling. I went in and they gave me some antibiotics and ask I return to have the tooth fixed on completion of my antibiotics. The service from this visit was great!
I returned on completion of my antibiotics and that's when the trouble started. They decided I needed to get a root canal on the tooth. It was still very sensitive and painful. The hygienist was very general when taking x-Rays and getting me into my room. The dentist came in and put a bit of numbing medication on my gums. The shot was done before the gum was numb and he started the dental work before the tooth was numb. He would not stop no matter what the hygentist or I did. I walked out of the office in tears and it wasn't until I got to my car the full effect of the numbing medication kicked in. The office staff and hygentist all seemed very upset about how the doctor did this. Needless to say I did not return to have my permanent crown done at this office and for purposes of all emergencies will seek care elsewhere!

name: Zack McGhee
text:
This may be unbelievable, but Northcutt Dental Practice is actually a pleasant place to visit.

I know, I know, what could be so pleasant about a dentistry practice? Everything, to be honest.

The staff are always pleasant and always have a smile ready. They're talkative, and will remember you after only 1-2 visits. Quite a difference from what you will probably find in other practices.

The people actually working on your teeth are very professional and knowledgeable. They know what they're doing and how to get it done with minimal pain. By far the best dental experience I've ever had (and I've had quite a few).

Gentlemen, take note: each and every woman there is a looker. That might not sway your opinion of this establishment, but hey, it doesn't hurt.

In short, Northcutt is the best dental practice around, and if you decide to get some work done, you'll do well to make an appointment with them.

name: Kathy Skipper Buckhault
text: The girls here are friendly,  courteous and treat you like family.   I would recommend Northcutt Dental Practice to everyone.  You can have late appointments, if needed.  I saw Dr. Spivey today and she was amazing.  My cleaning was done by Liz and she was so nice did a great job cleaning my teeth.  Can't wait until February!

name: Cranking Horses
text: Visited there for the first time this week and I have to say by far the best all around service I have ever received,From the time you walk in to the time you walk out everyone one of those young ladies was outstanding in there jobs.I highly recommend this place to everyone.(Island Man)

name: Mary Grace
text: Warm atmosphere !  when you walk in you're always greeted with a friendly smile. The receptionist at the front desk always greet you with welcome to North cut dentist. My two daughters feel very comfortable when they have to get dental work done.

text: They are so professional and nice. I will definitely be going back

name: Chasity Brown
text: The staff is amazing. They were very caring and had a wonderful bedside manner. Would definitely recommend you to use them.

name: Rebekah Tolin
text:
Don't expect pain relief after an extraction. Expect them to fix the complications? Nope. The dentist will call you in & slice on you more, charge money and tell you to put a cold compress on it.
This is bones being pulled from your skull.
Why are you making me suffer?
Don't go to this place.

name: Olivia House
text: I have been with this particular dentist office for 6-7 years now and have absolutely NO plans of changing. Liz is my hygienist, she is very gentle, caring and funny. I urge everyone to try this office for your next checkup, you won't regret it. By the way, you can watch tv while in the chair to ease your nerves and they also sell great prescription toothpaste at the front desk. :)

text: Friendly, clean, and efficient office! Liz did a great job on my cleaning. Whitney was willing to joke around with us. Feels like visiting friends instead of the dentist office. Recommend giving them a try.

text: I’m totally terrified of the dentist and have been searching for a number of years for the right sympathetic dentist. I recently had my first procedure and was more at ease the the Northcutt staff than I have been in years.

text: Northcutt Dental of Bay Minette is simply the best dentist in town! I would highly recommend them for all your dental needs! The staff there are the friendliest and make you feel at ease while your at the dentist. They really care about their patients at Northcutt Dental!

text: I do not enjoy going to the dentist but NorthCutt Dental made my appointment go by very smooth and my nerves settle. Raven weaver kept me entertained and my mind was at ease. text: Words cannot express the wonderful experience here at Northcutt. From the moment you walk into the door or even a phone call you are instantly family. The doctors, is specially dr. This is the perfect place. I swear they are magicians with how easily they fill cavities, clean teeth, and perform surgeries. Insurance or not this is the only place to get your teeth serviced.
